lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. Welcome. Before we get started tonight, we're going to get through some quick announcements. First and foremost, we have two sponsors tonight. Number one, our fresh sponsor for the evening is the fantastic upcoming film by the fantastic, glorious Guillermo del Toro, Pacific Rim. Uprising.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got that! Pacific Rim Uprising. It's going to be in theaters, RealD 3D, and IMAX tomorrow, Friday, March 23rd. My wife and I, we original Gipsy Danger fans, I'm just saying, I'm just going to put it out there, that's what we represent at the house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're big fans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm telling you. You can get tickets now at PacificRimTickets.com. The movie takes place ten years after the first film. A mysterious organization has reopened the breach for the Kaiju, and a Jaeger has gone rogue. It is up to John Boyega and his sweet 'stache, and his character, Jake Pentecost, to fight back and prevent humanity's extinction. It is out tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How could you not be more badass than playing the son of Idris Elba?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm telling you, man. I just want one of those outfits. I just want a Jaeger pilot outfit formed specifically to my body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you work in the effects team for Pacific Rim, and have an extra suit lying around, please send them to P.O.-- no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I'll work it into the story!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then a little Kaiju cosplay for Charlie, because we were saying Charlie was a Kaiju level negative three, or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He destroys nothing except carpets with his pee. Pacific Rim Uprising, tomorrow night, go see it, because I got my tickets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. And of course, our fantastic returning sponsor for the season, our friends at D&D Beyond. For those of you who haven't checked that out, D&D Beyond, it's awesome, they allow you to do all your stuff online for your D&D campaign, your character. Sam, do you have something to say about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the one. Thanks, everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam, and thank you, Ashley.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if it could've been better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley's parts filled in the gaps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, Emmy-nominated, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, freshly Emmy-nominated, Sam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Congratulations, Sam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have that new Emmy smell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A couple other things. One, we are saying goodbye tonight to a dear friend, our fantastic director of photography here on the program for a long time, Selena Ruth, she is moving on to much better pastures. We give all the love, and share love as well for the wonderful journey that's before her. Thank you! You're amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love your tattoos! (sobs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made Travis cry. Good luck, and super excited for you. Reminder, Twitch Prime, if you have Amazon Prime, and you can connect your account from Amazon Prime to Twitch Prime, and for free, every month, you get to subscribe to one Twitch stream for free, which you can do for here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every month?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every month!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's incredible! If you haven't done so, check it out! It costs you nothing and it's an extra click. Those who may have been here earlier might have seen we have the Critical Role recaps, so if you need a refresher for campaign two, the first ten episodes of the new campaign in Critical Role are now available on YouTube as the Critical Role Recap, hosted by our beloved Dani Carr, who is a longtime OG Critter, now member of this crazy team, and the person who, if you didn't know, originated the term, "Is it Thursday yet?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was her. That was Dani.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 100% true. She put it on her resume when she applied here, and I was super appreciative of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hard to say no to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Talks Machina, of course, is every Tuesday evening at 7:00pm Pacific, hosted by our fantastic Branredabafurser. That's for you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! And the best name yet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take that gift with you. No, but seriously, Brian's awesome. He hosts and talks about the episode that previously happened, so tune in next Tuesday to see about this episode, and whoever else that guests onto it then!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, Matt. I'm sorry, we love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay, it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM, MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, hello!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Episode one callback!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, spoilers, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam, stop it. Podcast of last week's episode, episode ten, is available for download where all fine podcasts are downloadable, so if you have friends who are in the audio-only version of the campaign or you want to listen to it while you're on your commute, it's available for download now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It sounds so good, much like an audio orgasm, just saying. Crisp!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. This weekend is WonderCon! In Anaheim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My goodness gracious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're all going to be down there Sunday at WonderCon for a Critical Role panel in the Arena, same area as last year. Let's see if we can pack it full of Critters again! That'll be 11:30am on Sunday in the Arena at WonderCon. We hope to see you guys there, bring some fun burning questions, and be prepared for the ridiculousness of most of us, but mainly Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to be there on Saturday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right! We have the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the Sagas of Sundry panel, in room 300B, at 2:00pm I think? Somewhere around there. Then after that we have the Women in Pop Culture panel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before all that, I'm going to be talking about comic books in that same room at the Wednesday Club.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everything is happening in 300B.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you're going to be at Wondercon, come hang out. That's basically what we're saying. Awesome. In convention news, C2E2 is coming up in just a few weeks in Chicago! We're going to be there for Saturday and Sunday, that's April 7th and 8th, so make sure you get tickets. You can buy tickets at c2e2.com! We'll have signings, panels and fun stuff, so come say hello, please, if you're in the area. Let's see. Issue five of Vox Machina Origins, the comic book, still out. If you haven't had a chance to pick it up I recommend it! Is there any new updates to merch, Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They only printed three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One small, one medium, one large.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just didn't think anybody would buy them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taliesin and I can't sew that fast, okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just know that if you order them there's a little bit of a delay, but it's fine, you can still get it. Put it in now, that way you can be sure you're getting it this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. Thank you, Laura. Once again, our fantastic charity, 826, and 826LA, and all the other 826 chapters out there, they do fantastic work with underprivileged kids and teens in creative writing, they have great classes and tutoring programs. If you have the opportunity to donate either some money or your time, if you want to volunteer as well, highly recommend it. Please look into it. They're awesome folks. Thank you, guys. Let's see, last but not least, a quick retooling that I'll be at Otafest in Calgary, up in Canada, May 18th to the 20th, and A-Kon in Texas June 7th through 10th, so come to either of those events if you can to say hello, I'd love to hang out. I believe that's it! We cruised through those as fast as we can!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, that was fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Last we left off, The Mighty Nein, the intrepid adventurers, had completed their task they had achieved from the King's Hall Taskboard to eliminate this spider scourge that had seemingly clogged up a portion of the sewers, discovered a subtle passage into the more upper class elements of the city, managed to extract some information from an individual they had saved from the webbing there, got your reward for it, had a conversation with Ulog of the Knights of Requital, who had discussed interest in possibly bringing you in for some endeavor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's his name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ulog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having some piss-poor ale, you had just exited the exterior of the tavern's location, out into the midnight evening air of Zadash, still a bit bruised and beaten from the battle earlier in the day, but eager to continue with what your next endeavor is. Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm tired. This was a long day. Are you guys going to keep drinking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, not in that fucking place, shit! Somewhere better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we making our way back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's go back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Going to just drink at the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or just go to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we won't sleep at the fancy place tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems like it's too much work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bit of a pain in the ass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a pain in the butt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, was there anything special about the room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope, it was just kind of fancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a bed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No treats or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a minibar, but I think you had to pay a lot of gold for each little thing of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably one of those ones, too, where you pick it up and it fucking automatically charges you. Dicks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're little seals, little arcane seals underneath it. You pick it up and try to put it back, but the seal's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The greed of the Crown, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the evening rainfall begins to fall a bit harder, from a soft drizzle to a decent pour, you hear the distant rolling and crackling of thunder, as a storm front has slowly brought its way in as the night has progressed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! It's like we don't even have to bathe, now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love the rain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, if we're just going back-- Pumat Sol, what was the name of his spot?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: It was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A soul asylum?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it wasn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could've been a cool name, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Invulnerable Vagrant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. How far away is the Invulnerable Vagrant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are now, exiting the Evening Nip, it's maybe a 20-minute, 30-minute walk to the middle of the Pentamarket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it late evening, like pre-midnight, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty late evening, it's pushing on midnight, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, never mind, I'll do it another day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go to sleep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go to sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleep, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back to the Leaky Tap, heading up to your rooms, and eventually find yourselves falling to sleep. However, the distant thunder rolls continue to quake the muffled interior of the rooms you're at, the lightning strikes flashing through the rooms that have a respective window, and the heavy impacts causing you to wake up in the middle of the evening at times with a restless bit of sleep. A faint drip of wayward rain seems to have collected and found its way through the roof of Beau and Jester's room, and the pattering in the corner of this small, building puddle causes you to frustratingly go and collect it, find something to at least keep it from making that noise throughout the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should fold up a blanket and put it under there, it muffles the noise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's a good idea. I hate ticking, or repetitive noises. That's so obnoxious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like (tapping).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That. Exactly like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or like, (clicking).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That counts as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I bet that would be annoying if you didn't like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about, like, (squeaking noises).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The same umbrella category, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a conversation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loosely. By definition.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just woke up, we're real tired, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mid-wee hours of the morning, you catch a quick glance at Yasha staring out the window at the storm, quietly sitting on the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances over. "Yeah?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even know you were in the room with us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're super spooky at night, you know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I get that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a little pale, so you have this ghostly quality to you. I don't know why I'm whispering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're all awake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all awake now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit down next to her and I show her some of my drawings to the Traveler that I did before I went to bed. Look, Yasha, it's rat balloons. I show her a little drawing I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They really are rat balloons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Little rat balloons, and one of them exploding with poison coming out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a hint of a smile at the edge of her lips, and she gives a nod. "That's pretty good. I could never draw."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No? Do you want me to draw you right now? I'll do it, okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her pull back a bit. Another flash, a nearby bolt causes the sky to light up. Yasha's unfazed, and her attention shifts back to the glass of the window again, a brief moment of trance-like attention before, "You should try to sleep."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives a nod and sits back down, closes her eyes, still sitting in a meditative position on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I draw her lit up by the lightning and then I go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Eventually, you all come to consciousness again, sore from the action of the previous day, but the daylight greets you, muddled as it is from the darkened grey raining skies that greet you. The thunderstorm is still passing through, and a quick glance out through the window into the main thoroughfare, you can see the streets are muddied, and in some places gathered into small pools and flooded puddles, but Yasha is gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe she was a ghost the whole time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the lightning exploded her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's heavy metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe she wandered out into the rain and lost her memory.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a possibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It seems possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knew I didn't like the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She probably just took off to handle some Yasha business, right, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably. We should ask Molly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll ask Molly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we still in our rooms, or are we downstairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Downstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all gather in the main area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just came to borrow some butter. I was making something in my room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got up early to use a ritual to bring Frumpkin back, I have enough supplies to bring Frumpkin back one time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are your hit points this time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not here. Oh, let's find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (boom) (exhale) Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather back in the tavern downstairs. You slept in a little, pushing like nine or ten at this point, but it is still gray and rainy outside. You can see carts making their way through the mud, some getting stuck and having to pull through, the beasts of burden trying to make their way through. The tavern interior is fairly light, not a lot of people in there, a few folks that are rushing through to grab a quick bite and leaving or having a drink in the face of a rather dreary day. But the room is yours. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm eating a carrot, you guys figure it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they say they had more jobs for us to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe they said there would be more, I mean, we don't really have anything until this evening, remember there's that meeting that we have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is the meeting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to take place in the cellar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have a plan for how we're going to-- what if they're taking you downstairs to ritually sacrifice you, or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are going to join this time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you don't all have to come. Some can stay above. I just wanted to put the invite out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were talking about a couple people watching out front, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will watch. I'm really good at keeping watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go with you, and Frumpkin will go with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so I'm going in to the belly of the beast? Sure. I'll disguise myself! I'll be just like Fjord. They'll think it's Fjord down there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, I wanted to talk to you about your Fjord disguise. It is just a little obvious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Honestly, it's very cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look just like him only slightly shorter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the first time I've ever done that spell. I was very impressed with myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would want to see what your range was, in case you wanted to, I don't know, perhaps mimic one of our other companions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A total stranger would also be very useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone from your deepest imagination.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone short.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See, that's too many options, when you can appear to look like anything! I need to focus! If I get lost in thinking, "What nose should I have? Bulbous, pointy, or patrician nose?" That could take hours to decide!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there, patrician! That's perfectly fair right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So a patrician nose?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes! See? One problem already solved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of eyes? What color? Blue, black, brown, green?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Green's pretty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe just one of them. Maybe you've got a patch over the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's too many new options.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A patch on one eye? What else do I have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you have a cleft chin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, yes, butt chin! Those are always good! Ooh yes, and give yourself red hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Red hair, green eyes, big patrician nose, cleft chin--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're getting into Mr. Potato Head territory. I think maybe a simple halfling woman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With red hair and a big patrician nose--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bald on top and red hair on the sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. And very curly!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are pulling your leg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Overalls with polka dots and a real big bow tie. And shoes bigger than you should be wearing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like you're describing a specific person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Not at all! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that sounds really attractive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just mull it over. Add it to your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll think about that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're rolling your mind's Rolodex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to pay off at some point in the future.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did Yasha take off?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she did that thing again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was staring at the storm, and then she went away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she sleep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, yeah, she sleeps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's a little creepy. In like, a hot way, but a little creepy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like in a protector, I felt safe when she was standing watch sort of way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, kind of.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, she does that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very mysterious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's good. She's just got some personal issues that's she's going through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hard to get a bead on her because she always takes up and leaves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It takes time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we all have personal issues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assure you; she's worth it. She'll be back in her own time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You seem normal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who? You?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're very normal!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you're weird. We already established that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, please, let's not start calling names!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Jester, also you have a very nice personality, but it is a big one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that have to do with anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, just what you were just talking about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He didn't mean it like that. Sometimes he's very honest with people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It did seem very pointed and targeted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's because I was speaking to you, Jester, sitting in front of me! You made the windows--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to open all the windows like this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all slam open loudly! Wind and rain begins to suddenly pour in from the side, from the wind blowing it through. All of a sudden, the few folks that are in there freak out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this storm is so crazy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wind howling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thaumaturgy to close the windows, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, I'm having a hard time myself getting through to Caleb, so I feel like it's hard for an asshole to teach an asshole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sometimes having a pupil teaches you something about yourself. Just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should punch him in the face?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it a shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am sitting right next to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was having a side conversation!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a small room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is terrifying, but I think the three most even-keel, normal of us should go to the meeting. I don't think that the three of us necessarily would be appropriate company.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We might stand out a little too much. It would be easy to recognize us as part of a meeting like that. You're green, but mostly you look pretty normal outside of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Jester. I appreciate that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll switch it around, then? Maybe Nott, you go with Jester. You stay up top, and I will go to this meeting. Frumpkin will stay with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This works for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not going to do the cloudy-eye thing when you're down in the meeting though, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, because I wouldn't be able to hear what they are saying or know what they look like. This one said she wants to punch me in the head. I don't want that to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You go all static channel on us, we might be in deep shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can learn a lot of things from being punched in the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have done that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want to do when we're supposed to be keeping watch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. There's so many options!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could find a candy store.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there any candy stores? There are stores that specifically sell candy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were in Nicodranas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we talking about drugs again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The rest of us are going to have some fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not until this evening, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's an evening meeting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to go see Enchanter Pumat Sol?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I do. I enjoyed his company so much last time. Feel like we've got a little more coin to spend, might be smart to stock up on items.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can also take the day to ask around and get a little bit more of a bead on the opinions of the locals on the current political climate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to return my key to the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to keep charging me a room until I give it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Thought your mom was going to pay for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's assuming the money shows up in time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to waste all of the money she sends on paying for the room, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's very smart of you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to be smarter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we set out to our various tasks, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're very smart, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Beau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will tag along with you again, because I still have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because now you have a fancy coat!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's functional.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you all divide into your various endeavors?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. To the fancy place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you go to Pumat's, I think. I don't know. I just haven't split up with you a lot lately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to the Invulnerable Vagrant!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not actually seen this Pumat, so I would love to actually take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! You will love him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! He's so wonderful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You and me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm coming with you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my auctioneer!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I am going with Jester to this fancy place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to the fancy place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or with us, we're going to go shopping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless you want to go with your protégé there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going with Jester. Yeah, I'll go with you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's our new bodyguard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are the muscle. She's the muscle. You guys are the muscle. I am not the muscle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys divide into your two separate groups, scattering this side, these three heading over towards the Tri-Spire. The other three of you guys are heading towards the Pentamarket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I grab my Mariner's studded leather armor out of my room and bring it with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Along the way, can I look for a tailor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! Make an investigation check. What kind of tailor are you looking for, a standard clothing tailor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking balls. Seven. Someone who can sew me a custom coat, a cloak, or add a lining to something like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could take you back to where I bought this cloak yesterday, if you want to go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It won't take terribly long. It takes you a little longer. Although if you're going to the same place he's already been to, then it completely circumvents that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they do custom there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and inquire. They do custom work, but it takes a little bit of time. It's a little pricier as opposed to buying one off the rack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll take about a day for them to finish the work on it, and it will run you about two silver.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're providing the cloak. Were you having a custom one made? Are you having a liner put in, or having a custom cloak made?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to take one of their cloaks and have a blue liner put on the inside to make it reversible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Full purchase of the cloak, and that'll put you about four silver for the full cloak. That includes the work, the lining addition, and the time waiting for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have that ordered. It'll be ready by midday tomorrow, they're saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, sir!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are going to make your way to the Pentamarket. At this point in time, it is still a fairly moderate downpour through the day. As you begin to come through, some of the carts are closed in the middle of the market: the ones that are more open that sell fresh goods or things that can be ruined by rainwater and that don't have quite as strong of a canopy, but there are some that are still open. They have hooded lanterns out to draw attention towards them, you have barkers shouting out, "Meats, fresh meats!" and trying to get your attention over there, but you guys maneuver through, making a beeline to your location. Eventually you come up to the warm-looking, dark wood exterior of the Vulnerable Vagrant facility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mutters) Vulnerable? Thought it was the Invulnerable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Invulnerable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be. The doors are closed, but it is warm on the inside, and upon checking the door, it is not locked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. We go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There across the room, you can see there are two Pumat Sols currently, one of them smiling and looking out your direction, the other one that is keeping an eye on the gentleman in the corner. The one that watches you enter gives a big grin, "Why hello there!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to see you again! Boy, it is sure coming down outside, wish there was a way to dry off real fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if that's what you're asking, I would be happy to help you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Fuck. (clears throat) What does it smell like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His breath is warm. There are elements of an herbal scent that immediately is overtaken with a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sour cream and onion chips.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not entirely unpleasant, but not pleasant either. It's a warm cow-breath smell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I want to pet a cow so bad right now, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see what we can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he takes a deep breath on you once or twice, you feel your body warm up for a moment as he finishes the Prestidigitation cantrip and you are suddenly, immediately dry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is much better! Thank you, Pumat! That is wonderful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is, quite literally, the least I can do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had a question for you: we found this armor down in the sewers and it seems to have some--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's really pretty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no, that's really pretty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you seen this armor before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Haven't seen that kind, no, but I like the designs on it. It's really pretty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, here's the thing. I spent a lot of time by the water when I was growing up, and when you live by the water, too much water theme in your design is overkill. You know, it's like the person that has the beach house and everything is shells and water and lobsters--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no, that's just a faux pas, socially."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I feel like this has some unique properties to it. Is there a chance that I could, I don't know, in some way transfer or copy some of that onto what I'm currently wearing? I have a little bit more intrinsic value with what I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me go ahead and have a look at it, if you wouldn't mind. There we go, there's a few "other pieces right there if you want to hand those over--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not really attached, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's all right. Oh, that's a full set!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if shells fall out, so be careful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Me, could you watch him?" The other one comes around the corner, "Oh yeah, no worries." Now the third one has entered the room and is looking-- this is a very strange sight for ye who has not been within the store first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot to tell you, there are multiple versions of Pumat. Apparently the other ones are called "Me me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I haven't seen you around. What's your name there, fellow?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, hello, Molly, hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Molly, hello to you as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pleasure, charmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attractive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, he's just a pleasant, jolly individual who is massive in size, even with a slight hunch around the shoulders and back, stands a full seven feet, probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's all right, I'm going to peruse a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yeah, no worries. Just be wary of anything you're planning to touch over there. Oh, "and you, you're just an adorable little friend, there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's nice to see you again, Mr. Sol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll let Fjord finish. But I have a request as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're going to go ahead and take those in the order they've been received. So if "you could respectfully have a moment to yourself there. We'll help you as soon as we can. Thank "you." He turns back around, and goes back to you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, hands in your pockets, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the two begin to look over, one of them is inspecting the quality of the armor while the other one closes his eyes and, as he begins to focus, you watch as this faint little flash emanates from the armor, briefly. He goes, "Oh, yeah, no; that there is a pretty simple "enchantment right there. There are limitations based on the strength of the enchantment and how "recently it's been applied to the equipment involved. But since this is a simple enchantment "it is something possible to translocate onto a similar piece of equipment. It is a bit-- there is "a cost to it should you be willing to pay for the service, but we can probably do that for you, yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any chance you could tell me how much it might cost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on just a second." He goes in the back room and you hear these two muffled (muffled conversation).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's really very nice and accommodating.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extremely accommodating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Knowledgeable, too, about all sorts of things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muted laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes back into the chamber. "So to have this enchantment transferred over, it's only going "to cost you about 80 gold pieces."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, a little-- 80? Eight zero, or one eight, 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eight zero gold pieces as it does require some components to both harness, extract, and "maintain the enchantment when it is put over to the new piece of equipment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, you had a request?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll put a little pin in that one. You had a question there, little one?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, yes. You sold my friend a haversack before, and it has these side pouches. Can you sell me a pouch, a little side pouch, just a little side pouchy thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "You see, unfortunately--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Drink cozy sort of a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have others, if you'd like to buy one for yourself."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other haversacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much were they, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For a return customer--" Do you have the card still on that one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You charged me an additional 200, but that was also giving you the glaive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a good discount. That glaive was really nice, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a few hundred at least. I don't have the card in front of me. "Yeah, I--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the card, but it doesn't say the cost. Ooh, it does, 1,350! Fuck! Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay, then. That's fine. I don't need-- I thought that they could be broken up and sold in little sets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, we could look into possibly devolving a small-based enchantment like that. I "mean, research and development of that does take a while. You'd have to fund the endeavor. The good "news is, when it's done you'd be the first to have an original Enchanter Pumat Sol pocket cozy pouch." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much would that endeavor cost me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I'll be right back." He goes in the back room again. (muted conversation) Comes back out. "Pumat Prime there says that for the process of research and development, should it be "successful, development of the object, it'll probably be about two weeks of time of enchantment "and the cost of the overall pouch will probably run you 200-250 gold pieces."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's mighty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a pretty good deal compared to the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I'd just get the side pouch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wouldn't get the full thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But, I mean, still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you going to put in it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Buttons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot of buttons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A regular pouch can hold a lot of buttons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. I'll think on it. Can I ask you one more question, Pumat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't mean to pry into your personal existence, but there seems to be many of you. Was that caused by magic? Did you do that? Is that an accident? Was that a splicing thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This lurching monolith over your tiny goblin frame. The face gets tense for a second and pulls back into this very warm, toothy smile and goes, "Oh, I like an inquisitive little girl." Pats and rubs your head. The hand is like a giant mitt that almost encompasses your entire head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get a fucking concussion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you look over there." He points on the wall, you see a framed symbol: three diamond shards that all point to the center in a flux capacitor-like design. He goes, "I'm actually an "annex of the Cerberus Assembly. So I get certain favors and I do things for them. I provide them, "occasionally, with my capabilities and some enchanted objects, and in return they were kind "enough to provide me with, well me, and him, and him."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the Cerberus Assembly is that powerful with magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're about the most powerful you find in the Empire, yeah. So me and my brothers here are "actually, technically, we're a Simulacrum."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. That's fascinating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you know, we do what we can."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If someone were to want someone with that sort of magical power, you could not provide that, but the Cerberus Assembly could?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I guarantee with enough positive reinforcement, with enough friendship attained "with certain members like I have developed over many years of hard work and providing services, "perhaps one day you too could be the fine owner of three other versions of your tiny self."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's amazing. Are they a secretive group? Do they have a business card or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not much of a business card. They got members all over. Most of them are up in the "capital, but there is one of them that runs that Hall of Erudition. Right over in the Tri-Spires."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you for the information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, happy to help."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did enjoy, most recently, unfortunately, one of your healing potions. Perhaps if I purchased a healing potion and the transfer of the enchantments, we could find some sort of a deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get it, get it, boy. 12, It's not terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I respect your candor. I see that you have a keen mind for business relationships. However, I "do have to turn a profit. So I can't do much for you there, my apologies."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. Healing potions were how much again? 70 gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, those were 50 gold apiece."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 50 gold. Wow, I got to work on my fucking memory. Great, I will take a healing potion and the enchantment transfer, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. That will will run you 100 and--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "30 gold pieces, that's correct. There's your healing potion. You get your basic one right there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It'll take about an hour to transfer this here enchantment for you. So be patient and come "back in about 60 minutes. Should be ready to go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I take the breastplate part of my leather armor off and leave it with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, this is-- want us to clean it for you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that would be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, please clean it. Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not that bad. You don't have to act like it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was starting to-- it has a brine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you prefer black ice, lavender or new leather?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: New leather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "New leather it is. We'll get it right to you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been doing a perusal, by the way. Is there anything that's caught my eye in this--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make an investigation check. It's hard to concentrate, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there's a lot of things here. Many not anywhere near your price range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three that catch your eye that are loosely interesting, at least, between you and your allies. There is one pendant that has a darkened ivory spiral and almost a heart sculpture, but it is roughly sculpted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is currently labeled with a fine ribbon at the bottom at 150 gold. It states that it has the capability of-- you can almost hear it in his voice after seeing and meeting him for this short time. "It's capable of ensuring that if you take too many hits it will help prevent you from bleeding "out on your own."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Also, when you take a rest, you get a little bit of a bonus when healing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one of them that's this darkened, orangeish, amber-colored orb or marble about that big. That is 350 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ribbon attached to that one states, "Should someone holding this have the capability "of spinning spells one way or the other, they could probably keep one stored in this thing and release "it at a later time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had one of those last campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a ring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a ring of holding, yeah. Good stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The final piece that I noticed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one is labeled at 800 gold. "The donner of "this cloak would find themselves largely protected in certain ways from the elements, or blows, or "magics, or what have you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a cloak of AC? No, like resistance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cloak of protection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cloak of protection, like ring of protection.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It gives you some bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, I want a ring of protection again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we all do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super squishy-ass, crispy tacos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we kill all of Pumat Sol and come back and rob this place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a great plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an option.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you only have to kill the one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Prime.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This conversation did not happen in the game, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I assumed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did we each make off of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should be tracking it in your D&D Beyond currency counter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't put that in our--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I added my 100. We each got 100.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I think I added it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was 700 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I did. So I can technically afford this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, one of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd love to see that heart locket if you don't mind. This thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you spit on my thing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably, you made me laugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could you help him?" The other one's like, "Yeah, no worries, I got you. Hey there, buddy, what you "looking at over there for?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pleasure to meet you. I was looking at this piece right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yeah, no. Let me pass you over a little more information about that. That's a periapt of "wound closure, if you're so interested. It both allows you to stabilize when you hit zero hit "points, and when you're using hit dice to heal up, it's a little bit nicer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this like, if I'm healing him, does he still get the double hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just when it's doing hit dice."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to attune to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wound closure? You cut yourself all the time, that would be very useful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They tend to sort of heal themselves, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it reusable?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is quite nice, oh yeah. You know what? I think I'm going to treat myself, I'm going to take it. I feel like I've earned something, we've had a good run of it, and I have never spent this much money on anything in my life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, we've got some good momentum right now, right? What could possibly happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not going to lie, really appreciative to have, just here in a few days, returning customers "willing to spend fine, hard-earned gold on some finely crafted and enchanted objects."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pass 150 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An absolute pleasure there, you say it was Mollyoop?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just Molly to my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Molly it is."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is wonderful. I'm going to add it to my other necklace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks incredible. It's found a place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel, it's right to my heart. Right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pumat, before we go, I wanted to ask you, I know that you're an annex of the Cerberus Assembly. How do you feel about the governing parties here in town? Are you happy with the way things are run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, overall it seems to be as fine as it can be."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know, some folks don't have as much coin as others, but what can you do to really help "them? We do what we can, but there's a lot of dangerous things out there. We got all sorts of "baddies coming over from Xhorhas, we got the possible encroaching of foreign powers always "looking to peek over the mountain range and try and steal some of our hard-earned materials. So I "think it's good they keep us nice and safe and, I mean, I got myself a fine business, too."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I think it's great that you support the barracks. Do they come in for regular purchases every week or every month or find themselves in your store more often than not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are you referring to?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The members of the Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They usually send requests, they make orders and I "have them sent on over to either Rexxentrum or the Hall, if that's where they're going to be "utilizing them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's wonderful. Well, thank you, thank you for your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries. They're a fine bunch. They do a lot of good, they keep the Crown in check, they "make sure there's no abuse of power and they also have been very staunch supporters of helping "promote learning here in the smaller, more middle to lower classes here in Zadash."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh really? They're not as protective of certain knowledges as other parts of the government might be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I mean, protective of knowledge in the sense that not everyone can be trusted with "knowledge and, I'm not going to lie, some of the things even I know could be real dangerous in the "wrong hands, so I think it's important there has to be a certain level of control. I've seen some "really nutty people out there that I can't imagine what it would be like if we didn't have some sort "of law and order."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But they might be a bit more open-minded to people sharing in that knowledge if they were the right type of person, say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could very well be! They've been very kind to me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm glad to hear that. Nott? Molly? You have everything you need?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I've been looking in the little mirror, trying to get the height right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to bring the mirror with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was joking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll probably be back in like a day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we'll be here. All four of us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goodbye, Pumats Sol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure to meet you, little goblin lady!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give Pumat Prime our best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will. Right now." He goes in the back room as the other two are still focusing on your armor. As you leave the two that are focusing go, "Thank you!" "Thank you!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait the better part of an hour, are able to retrieve your armor, and indeed you now have the Mariner's armor enchantment on your breastplate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for not making me stand out in the rain for an hour without top pieces. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the three of you. So what means are you attempting to enter the Tri-Spires?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go back to the gate, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You know, I had that bad time yesterday, but probably different guards there and I have this cloak now so I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look really-- can I? I'm going to brush your hair out of your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And like, wipe at any dirt off your face, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the rain has already taken care of most of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. Well, it's washed it off, but now I've got to get the smudges off. Because, you know, it's still kind of there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. Is it good?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you look sparkling clean! You look very dashing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. We'll see if the guards think so, eh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Just keep your cloak really tight on you, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the idea, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look to be fairly decently dressed, a male and a female. You don't know if they're married or not, but they appear to be a couple. A friend of theirs is off to the side. All in cloaks, hoods up, very nice cloaks, thick but very well-made as the rain is still coming down. They're all bundled up, but there is a point of recognition with the guards as they pass by. As they move beyond, the guards once again approach and they're like, "Halt."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hello again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello again."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We're making our way to the Pillow Trove. That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both give a look over the two of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all nice and buttoned up. Belt tied.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking at the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looking tough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of this, make a persuasion check, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Okay. That was not a lot of flourish there, but 17!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It went back to a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know it did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Come in." You guys quickly make your way through the open gates, under the portcullis, into the cobblestone streets of the Tri-Spires, and there you see the Silken Terrace, the three towers that mark the central part of Zadash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (giggles) We made it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's nice in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?! Should we ask where the smutty shop is that you want to go to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has a name. It is called Chastity's Nook.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it's right in the name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go back to the guard and ask where the Chastity's Nook is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I-- oh." He gives you this weird look as you ask him. He's like, "Actually, it's right there "in the Silken Terrace to the left of the large bakery. It's the hut-looking thing."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you very much, I appreciate all of your help, you've been wonderful, okay, bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course," he says behind you as you rush off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bakery

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, they make pornographic cakes there, so it's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You enter the Silken Terrace. First off, the beautiful cobblestone streets before you are broken up by small patches of small fenced-in shrubbery and flower bushes. The whole interior here is such stark contrast to the rest of the city. It is both surprising and sickening knowing some of the harder lifestyles that exist on the outside of the walls here. There are a few large sights as you pass through here. There is-- one of the large towers here is part of the ivory and marble structure that has large blue banners that hang down the sides. The central tower itself fires up into the sky. This centerpiece-- and you've known this because you've been here before-- is known as the Zauber Spire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zombra Spire-- Zombra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's broken up into several pieces, but you can see a lot of the treetops, and there is this very natural, almost picturesque beauty of the interior.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was that called again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Gilded Willows. It's the broken up residential aspects of this area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, it's Bel-Air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There is the Triumph Chime, which is a seven-story temple and belfry that has been retrofitted as the previous-- and you would know this from learning your history lessons-- actually, make a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe you know it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might not remember it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was so good, too! Almost! Did you see that? History? Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You know that it's there. You know the three towers are there. There's the Zauber Spire; the Constellation Bridge in the Gilded Willows, which is a giant watchtower that overlooks the entirety of this city; and then the last bit is the Triumph Chime, but that's all you know about them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or a church-turned-cult. I don't remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Constellation Bridge sounds very pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is relatively crowded. A lot of the folks are bundled up. They have large mittens on, heavy coats and cloaks and a lot of the general elite that live in this vicinity have come here to pick up warm goods to help go against the cold rain that's now coming down upon the city. To the right of that, towards the very edge of this road of various shops and market bits, there is a building that is small with a thatched roof, like it's more for the visual aspect of it. It's made to look almost like a small country cottage but it's plainly intentional and is an aesthetic that's been placed onto it to make it look different and interesting from the rest of the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a tiki bar!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not packed, but it's making business. What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just before we head that way, just out of curiosity, what is the name of the bakery that is near?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually can't see the name from the outside. You'd have to go and ask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go and ask. I walk into the-- come, are you hungry?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I always am hungry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I will get us some sweets if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, why not? We are flush at the moment. I walk in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to ask. As you walk inside, there is a whole table set up with warm goods and a kitchen that's constantly going. There's about 12 patrons in there right now in the process of eating or ordering. It's called the Meal Hearth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your hands are going to be all sticky before you handle the books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groaning and laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, you can load up on--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what are you in the mood for? Do you want something sweet or something savory?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, this bakery that we had in Nicodranas had amazing bear claws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bear claws. Well let's see. Excuse me? Whoever's running this show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the midst of the chaos you see a young man in his late teens or so with a little bit of a prickly chinstrap beard, very short, tattered brown hair but other than that spry, smiling. He has an apron on, and he's currently putting a small tray on the edge, "Hello. Can I help you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're in the mood for some bear claws, the kind they have in Nicodranas. Have you heard of these? Do you have them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have bear claws. I don't know if we have any Nicodranas bear claws?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll take the bear claws, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and then we can compare and let you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know the only major difference is they load it up with cinnamon--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's exactly what I was going to say! Cinnamon, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can do that. That'll be done. How many would you like?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably ten bear claws. Also do you have any hot freshly baked bread?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That we do as well. Of course."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take a large loaf of hot bread, fresh out of the oven, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, you'll have to wait the moment. About 20, 25 minutes, we'll have a fresh one for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can go shopping and come back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll return. We'll double back for the bear claws. So we'll come back for ten of these and that hot bread.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So ten bear claws and bread. You want to pay in advance?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, that's no problem. What do I need?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for all the bear claws and the loaf of bread--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not that much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably run you three silver.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. One. Two. Three. Easy. Thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course. See you back here in a minute. As soon as you turn around, somebody else has pushed past you and gotten in the front. "I'd like three of--" and you're like, ugh, this place is awful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, it's too crowded in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, I'll buy you some porn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's good to know. I lead the way to Chastity's Nook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter the small shop, the interior is beautiful and surprisingly busy. There's five other patrons that are currently perusing through various tomes and stacks of artwork. You can see it carries many books and different types of tawdry decor, like rugs, embroidered tapestries, candles, both scented and not, and you can smell oils and incense in there as well. It's this mishmash of scents. It's dark-lit in the interior, but as soon as you enter, almost every other person glances over their shoulder at you and goes back about their business. As soon as you finish scanning the room, a voice peeks up and goes, "Hello!" You glance over and see a human female in her 40s, mousey brown hair, wild and curly that goes past her shoulders, and she has a heavy sweater on and these big glasses right in front of her face. She goes, "Can I help you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a very handsome sweater you have. Is that from here in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you so much. It was a gift."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, what is your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Iva."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Iva. Pleasure to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Iva Deshin and this is my shop."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Iva Deshin. I'm new to town, and I'm looking for a bit of reading, and this place has been highly recommended to me, and I'm wondering what--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A grin curls past her face. She goes, "Recommended? You want to go to that back." She points, and you can see now that she's pointed out, because it's one long chamber with shelves and a central table. The beginning has more of the accouterments, like the candles and the various knickknacks you can purchase. In the back, you can already see there are large scrolls that are hung up, with beautifully painted nudes. You can see rows and rows of-- (laughing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I made you plan for this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know you did. Yeah, you did, buddy. There are stacks of books where the covers have their own individual paintings, where you can see--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Detail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a portion of a moonlight painting of a brawny-looking man who's dipping a fainting woman in a delicate dress, glistening across the moonlight. It's slightly pulled open, yeah. This is the young adult romance section of any bookstore on full display, and the more you look back, you can see there's a few figures in the process of thumbing through the books, reading them where they stand in the middle there. "Are you looking for anything in particular?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, my tastes are very varied. I'm always looking for something new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ooh, I have recommendations, if you like."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course. I am very interested in literature recommendations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is outer empire, so folks have varying interest. There's Tusk Love. That one's a little more saucy."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Tusk Love! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you want something more gentle, something that's more of a classic love story, we have Guard of My Heart. Shallow Breaths are a bit more bawdy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to buy Tusk Love, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right this way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As she walks away from us: You know, I'm obviously here for a purpose, but I like historical fiction as well, and I like when the two things are combined. Do you know what I mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sex and history.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She plucks a copy of Tusk Love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm following, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four score--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Define 'historical.' What are your interests?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like historical fiction. I don't like shallow smut. I like to learn something while I'm being titillated, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made me do this, Liam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love how many book titles you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Edubation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Edubation?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (straining) A squared plus B squared equals C squared!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have rolled a

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "It's been banned for the past 15 years, but I do have a couple of reclaimed copies of Courting of the Crick, if you'd be interested."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Courting of the Crick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm very much interested, in this and other books as well, but we will start with (whispers) the Courting of the Crick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, because it's--" and the voice stays very hushed, and she adjusts her glasses, the closer she gets "--because it is technically not supposed to be here, it's a bit pricier. That one runs you about 15 gold pieces."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still interested. I would like to see the quality of the book. You know, see if it's in mint condition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, it's not a worry. Just a moment." The other books, the regular books--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did she walk away from me, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Briefly, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On her? On the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you complete your incantation, there is a slight shimmer of energy that expands around the chamber, and scanning through and across the books, nothing peeks out at you as magical from the shelves. It looks there's only a collection of tomes. You get a small blip from the hunched, cloaked figure in the corner that's currently reading through one of the books hurriedly. Just a faint source of magic on their person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The range, I believe, is 30 feet, if I'm not mistaken. Yeah, it is. Am I covering every part of the store where I am? I start to browse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It's concentration, so you can pass around. You scan the entirety of the room. It does not appear to be that there is anything directly magical being put on any of the shelves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's because this whole place is magical, Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Angels and demons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only blip of magic source you're getting is from one of the patrons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just one of the patrons. Nothing behind any doors, nothing on the shelves. Okay, I wait for her to return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does there appear to be a used book section, like trade-ins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a symbol of status. The more books you have, the more you can display on your shelves, the more well-read you are to your guests, as you have them over. There isn't a big market for returning things you've read.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh. Okay. You can learn a lot from what people wrote in books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up to one of the other patrons that's hurriedly looking through one of the books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The one that's closest to you, or one of the other ones?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. Whatever one is closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's closest to you, as you approach from behind, he has a dark brown cloak that's pulled over one shoulder. He's wearing a sky blue tunic, soft, a silk sheen to it in what little bit of lantern light is lighting the interior. From the side of his chin, you can see he's got a softer, rounder face, and as soon as you begin to approach, as you aren't approaching quietly, he stops, the book closes, back on the shelf. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Perception? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is Shallow Breaths.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Breasts, or breaths?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Breaths.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heaving.

lines.text: (singing) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys meet up back at The Leaky Tap with the rest of your party. You have already retrieved your freshly transposed enchantment on your breastplate. You guys gather once again in the tavern to consolidate your plans for the day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pull Molly aside? Hey, I wanted to ask you. When you stopped Nott from rifling through my shit last night, what was she looking for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think to ask. Honestly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She wasn't grabbing for anything in particular?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that I remember.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She going through your stuff too or just mine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, no, not my stuff. That'd be ridiculous. My stuff's worthless.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just can't help herself, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It happens. Just keep an eye on your things and make sure you always know how much money is in your purse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's early afternoon. Is there anything you wish to do with your day? Any place you wish to go? Anybody you wish to talk to? What do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I'm a little tuckered. I'm going to take a rest upstairs. I'm going to copy that last spell into my book. I'll see you guys in a little bit, maybe around dinner time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys hang around until he's ready?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I can go check out one of the temples.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to wander around the back side of The Leaky Tap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before you leave, real quick, Beau asks you if you found any information out while you were on your journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
