lines.text: I didn't. Actually, I happened to ask Pumat Sols, the plural, and he happens to be like an annex shop of the Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? I'm with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So he supplies goods to all parts of the kingdom, but he says they keep a good balance in check from the power of the empire. Keeps a tight leash. I didn't ask about any religious uprising or anything, but he seems like such a nice guy and doesn't seem the type to rat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Interesting. We went to the fancy end of town where I'm pretty sure everyone is super into the crown because they are all funded by the crown and they are the crown, so I was like eh, probably a bad place to start asking political questions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody stopped you? You got in all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did, yeah! Went to a smut shop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good. How'd that go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As to be expected. Smutty. What should we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I was just thinking, for this evening, maybe we should double-check there aren't alternate exits coming in and out of that cellar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in case it's a trap or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that dwarf didn't really give me a very good feeling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, we know that people are looking for these type of rebels. If we can see a board ratting people out, so can other people. We don't want to get caught in a sting operation, for lack of a better term.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. You want to walk around the back to see if there's another way in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we go around the back of the tavern and look for back doors, floor latches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Do you guys want to make separate investigation checks or does one of you want to help the other?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll help you make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get advantage on your investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money! Are you fucking serious?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which ones did you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, they're both threes. I rolled two threes. Both threes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the plus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four, so seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure if it goes to the same place where you met or a separate subterranean space, but it is currently locked off, chained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Locked off, chained? Does this alley have a lot of human traffic or are we on our own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys are on your own at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you try and pick this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I have a crowbar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. I'm going to stand watch in the opening of the alley. I'm going to make sure while he does this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I have a crowbar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to go ahead and pry the chain off of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and pop the lock? Is it like a chain and a lock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it's a chain and a lock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. That's not as good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could get Nott in here to try and pick it. Just leave it nicely looked like it's not opened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to go snag her? I'll keep an eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll be right back. Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gnawing) What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate to interrupt your dinner. Can we borrow you for a quick second?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (swallowing) Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get led outside in the soft drizzled exterior into the alleyway, feet clomping through the muddy floor. They show you to the outside of an angled door that leads to a basement cellar that is currently chained with a lock in the center of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you pick this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I pick that lock?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep a lookout.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do a quick look. Both ends of the alleys and on the windows around the area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. He takes one end; I take the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check from each of you guys and make a check with your thieves' tools.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus fucking ballsacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (tink)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mine's okay. 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One. It's magically enchanted. It's magically-- Ah! My eyes! Ah! It's magically enchanted!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh! I cover her mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are my thieves' tools broken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty bent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh that sucks. Oh I have thieves' tools! Can I try?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give them to me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give Nott my thieves' tools.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try again. You don't see anybody currently heading down or near the alley at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. There aren't any windows in the back of the building, since there are small vents for kitchen smoke to filter out, but there's no windows looking out into the alley.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No windows facing that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Better. What do I add?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You add your proficiency bonus and your dexterity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These tools are so much better than mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I stole them off of a really rich guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lock comes straight off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I hang on to them for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can have mine. Actually you can't, I'd like to keep them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You'll just owe me later, how about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pull the lock of the chains, open the cellar and look down. It's dark. There's no light source in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have my orc--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put on the goggles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it, yeah. Might as well use that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head down. It is a second cellar. It is not the same cellar you guys have met with before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the same cellar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this one can only be reached from the exterior.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no entrances? No secret entrances? No trap doors hiding behind barrels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck this up this time, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on this because there is no light source.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's cocked on a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because there's no light in there. So even though you have darkvision, it's still dim light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. Okay. What am I doing? Investigation? 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any other passageways. No hidden doors or anything. In fact, this one's fairly empty. There's a few barrels in here and some small crates, but a lot has been moved out of here, either because it was recently used or it hasn't been restocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any good bottles of wine or brews laying around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to search around for valuable shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You find, not a bottle of wine, but you find a couple of heavy jugs of some sort of an older ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Okay, you glance around, you find a few odd copper pieces that are in the dust. You do find a set of metal bracelets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Connected to each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They're separate. But you do see they're currently resting around a skeletal wrist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a skeleton down here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a human size skeleton?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a human size skeleton. It's been here for a

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stuttering) Dead guy. Dead guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did they not clean when they bought this place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was some sort of a dungeon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come down at the mention of a skeletal wrist. Are there any other bodies in this cellar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the only one you find.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, no one's around, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my adventurer's kit and light a torch, because fuck this darkvision shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get a torch situated. It lights up, the room's brighter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one knows we're down here, right? The door's closed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm going to leave because we're all three down here and go back up to the top and keep an eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do we see anything else weird? More dead bodies, anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No more dead bodies. Even this one you find is mostly like it was stuffed behind some of the barrels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I tell how it died?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a medicine check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Died of a broken heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a skeleton.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No clothes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is some elements of cloth on there but it's been down here long enough to decompose to a mostly skeletal state. So it was probably here a long time ago, and it was pressed up into this corner and barrels were pushed up against it to keep it out of sight. Probably the reason it hasn't been found until now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Nothing to see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's really gross.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No other ways in or out, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, anything else now that I have the light on? I don't see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. (long sigh) I take one of those bottles of beer, then I leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's somewhat cloudy when you shake it, but still full.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Close the door up, run the chain back through, put the lock on it, but don't lock it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well. We're going to have to have a good, I don't know, a good chain of eyes out as we're down there tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to establish some sort of, like, if you get in trouble is there a way to alert us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Frumpkin? I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not really, because if Caleb's going to be down there with us-- I think, if we start screaming or you hear a ruckus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I'm with you, I can cast Message and alert our friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, down there I'm not so worried.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: It's about people coming in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well then I'll stay out and I'll Message you when--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, somebody outside The Leaky Tap, another person on the inside to run interference, because you can buy us a couple seconds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can Message Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can Message any of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or any of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, couple layers, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Any other prep we should do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We still have a few hours until sundown. Do you guys want to wait until the evening comes about? You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get food. I'll read some of my book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys rest, the evening's light eventually comes to a darkened sky, the storm slowly begins to pass while the sky still remains somewhat cloudy, the stars not visible. It appears that the heavy waterfall from the air above has come to a patter, to a halt. As you prep for the tension of the evening's choices, we'll go ahead and take a break. Be back here in just a moment, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: High action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) This is some unique excursions into the city today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so happy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Iva!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember my 12 and 13-year-old excursions into the back of the comic book store with the 18 and up section. Oh man. "How old are you kid?" "Pretty old."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You probably got away with it. You looked like you were 30 when you were 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a sniper shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. First, before we dive back in we have our winner of the evening, it is Areski14! Congratulations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "A risky 14"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Areski.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Areski!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A-R-E-S-K-I 14, congratulations! We'll get that to you ASAP. As you have taken the afternoon to rest within The Leaky Tap tavern, and the midnight meeting looming, what would you guys, if anything, you want to do anything or do you want to wait until the time transpires?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys want to go anywhere? Pumat told me that the Hall of Erudition is really cool and has some cool things in it if we wanted to check it out. Or! We could go kill The Gentleman!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go kill--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, is that what we're supposed to do? Kill The Gentleman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we're going to kill him right off the bat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That feels a little premature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even know who he is yet, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we could introduce ourselves and then kill him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could have a whole infrastructure of people supporting him and then they would come after us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to know who he is, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Super interested to find out who this guy is. I feel like we should deal with one thing-- I'm super focused on this current--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean we could hang out in the lobby in this bar, and I could watch every person that comes inside. I could draw their picture and know every single patron that's in here so that we have something to turn into the guards when we rat everybody out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I was thinking. So the three of us are down in the meeting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's going down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The three of us. Nott, if you could be outside, letting us know if any crownsguard or other surly types look like they're coming in to raid the place, you send a Message, and then you two run interference if they actually make it inside the doors, in case we haven't made it out yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just be distracting!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, whatever you do, buy us some time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're good at that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can be very distracting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last thing we want is to take the fall for these assholes, whoever they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These Knights of Requital.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will hang out up here and just be weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys spend the remainder of the evening waiting for this to transpire, some patrons come in, some leave. You're reading through the book?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Read the book!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I have the "Tusk Love" too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go back and forth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I read it and I keep looking at Fjord like-- and then go back and read it. I assume it's about some sort of orc love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Damn it. Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It deals with the union of half-orc and the daughter of a traveling merchant as they meet on the Amber Road up near Druvenlode. It goes into a saucy union between the two, but they can't, because what would the parents think? Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the name of the half-orc?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oskar. With a K. Oskar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What you reading there, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. Beau, as you're reading through the book, it's interesting. It begins to talk about the conflict between the Julous Dominion and the Dwendalian Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Conflict between the Julous Dominion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the Julous Dominion and the Dwendalian Empire. You're uncertain-- Make a history check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remembering back to your studies, these names don't ring a bell. Either they're obscure or fictional for the purposes of the story. However, it does speak of a Crick assassin that had snuck its way past the borders during the conflict, and had attempted to take the life of a general named Theo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Theo, okay.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Theo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Bill Cosby) Rudy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ruined forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The failed assassination attempt led to the capture of the assassin during, essentially, a test of wits between the general and this assassin--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, test of wits. Like, Dinner with Andre style?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. The assassin's been captured, removes the helmet, and behind is revealed to be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The assassin removed his helmet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The assassin's helmet was removed by the general after being caught.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the helmet we found in the graveyard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not very good smut, at least at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, am I writing down smut right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course you are. In size 38 font in your fucking notebook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Are you going into how Theo and the assassin had a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. We're getting there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This has to be important!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's telling it to me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just listen! Just listen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The assassin is revealed to be from the Kryn Empire of Xhorhas, with dark blue-purple skin, gray-white hair, and pointed ears of elvish lineage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, leave it alone. Stop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a dark elf, right? Or a drow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's short for cricket because supposedly when the Kryn armies charge into battle, there are designed holes and tubes in the armor that sounds like a flock of crickets rushing into battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I be able to discern where the assassin entered into the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not a detailed historical book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not like, "by the third lamppost, remove this brick." Okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This book sucks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far in are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Halfway, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long have you been working on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Couple hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the evening clocks in close to midnight and the majority of the patrons begin to dwindle and scatter into the night air, you watch as Ulog enters quietly, gives a nod of knowing towards the two of you, then, on his own, steps down into the cellar. About ten minutes or so later, you watch as Kara, the half-elf girl you had met before, enters, gives you a glance, but doesn't acknowledge anything, orders a drink, leans against the wall, then eventually disappears down into the cellar as well. Later on, you watch as Dolan, the human you had spoke with, that seemed to be the one spearheading this meeting before, enters with another human male. They both look back and forth, acknowledge you guys. The two of them eventually splinter off to different sides of the room, waiting. One, and a few minutes later, the other down into the cellar area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we recognize the other human male that he's with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he seem to be armed, or shady, or have lots of scars on his person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Hard to tell at this distance. You didn't see any visible or apparent scars or anything that gave you a sense of shiftiness, other than the careful demeanor. It didn't look to be a face of a rugged soldier, by any means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look like an undercover cop, trying to blend in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How were his shoes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "How were his shoes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like nice loafers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems nervous, but not in a way that triggers your spider-sense, so to speak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you guys still up top? Okay, I'm going to go over to Fjord and say: You said that one of the members of their group is named Dolan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it comes up, no big, could you find out that guy's last name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dolan's last name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Any reason why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know a guy named Dolan Taverski.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taverski?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've heard it. Just find out his last name!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Is this guy from where you're from or something? Old mate of yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, just have something of his.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taverski. Would he know you if I was like, "Hey, friend of ours named Nott--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, nope, would not know me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check, watching this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 total? You get no bead on the wild words that are coming out of her mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are-- no, never mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll find out his last name. I'm sure he won't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be up here. If I see anything suspicious, I'm going to Message you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. Crownsguard, rough-looking types, people that are armed, right? You keep a fucking swivel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, I'll keep an eye out. I'll be in disguise. I'm going to cast Disguise Self on myself, turning myself into a halfling with red hair, green eyes, a hawkish nose, overalls, thinning on top, too-big shoes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's your best disguise yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott? Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot it was you for a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Call me a code name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Tton.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tton. Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Tton it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: T-Ton.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The second T is silent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go outside and stand at the front door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we be outside too? Or should we stay inside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you're supposed to stay inside. If I see anyone coming, you distract them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How will we know if you see anyone coming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will tell you with my Message spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you will Message us, and then you will Message the others?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I don't use it a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do it twice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can do it twice. I can do it twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that'll work then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then, we'll just hang out in here and have some fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ready?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's see what they want to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who all is going down? It's you three?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Table one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's these three jackasses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Table right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you descend into the cellar below, you can see there's a table already set up with a few chairs around. There are two oil lamps that are turned low, and the four figures you saw enter are all sitting around, waiting. As you begin to descend, they give a knowing nod, and gesture to please take a seat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it just the four of them? No more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the four of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take a seat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we sit. It's polite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter, Dolan, the one who was leading before, sits up and goes, "I'm sorry-- what, um--?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm with my friends here, they've shared a bit of what is gone on here and I'm sympathetic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very clever, has no love for the Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A valuable asset. Good with... things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought we could let you decide for yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look to each other. "Have a seat."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, this is Dolan. Dolan, this is Caleb. Dolan, do you have a last name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They glance about. "Dolan Thrym."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thrym.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is Horris Thrym, my partner." The man you saw enter earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The human male?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. "You know Kara and Ulog. What was your name again, you said?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Caleb. Thank you very much for meeting us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it just the four of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulog has been-- and please, take no offense, we're just very careful-- keeping a very close eye on your activities since we last met. Bit of a scare as you entered the King's Hall, but I've heard that you've done a bit of business, unrelated. He speaks to your skill and we may have--" He looks nervously over, and Horris leans forward and goes, "We put two months into planning something, and it requires certain skill sets. Ulog, if you'd like to elaborate on this." The dwarf leans forward, pulls one of the lanterns closer, so all your faces brighten up just a bit. He turns the wick up a bit. "So we've intercepted some documents to Lord Sutan, one of the pretty faces and money grabbers over there in the Tri-Spire. Very politically connected. Apparently, he's been doing some business with a lowlife who's known in the more crown-based circles as one of those arrest-on-sight types. We believe this individual might be involved with The Myriad.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (whispering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We tried to bring this information to the Lawmaster, Orentha, as she is a friend of Dolan's. However, we were intercepted by the High-Richter Prucine. She's about as corrupt as you get in the structure here in Zadash. She intercepted it, so that she delivered the information. I've heard nothing since. A couple of our members have been closely watched by the Crownsguard ever since. So we believe the High-Richter might be in on it. We've decided if we can somehow turn Lord Sutan against the High-Richter, and then expose them to the Lawmaster, they'll either be arrested or ousted from their positions. Which, one, would be victory for those who don't want to live under the claws of corruption in this city. And two, vacates the position of High-Richter. While Horris' practice may have been irrevocably damaged in the public eye, Dolan is a respected member of the society here. The locals at least. We believe that, if not the High-Richter himself, perhaps another position as things shift. It would behoove us--" Dolan puts his hand up and says, "It would be helpful to have at least one of us with an ear on the bead of the inner circle of how law is distributed within Zadash. While it is not my bailiwick, people seem to trust me, and I think that's the most important thing when taking an office. We've outlined a means of doing so. This is where we may need your help." Looks over to Kara, and the half-elf leans forward, "All right then, so, the current plan is to infiltrate the Lord Sutan's estate in the Tri-Spire, steal a copy of his wax seal, and his handwriting. After we forge a little of the correspondence to this unsavory individual who he was speaking to in this letter, we make a new one that writes about an assassination of the High-Richter, sealed, and signed by the Lord Sutan. Then, we infiltrate the home of the High-Richter, tear apart her living space, look like it's been tousled and tossed, like someone was seeking her while she was out for the night, at a local ball, which she'll be one night from here. Before she returns to find her place destroyed, we take this letter that we found and left it, hidden within her room. She finds the letter, brings it to the Lawmaster--" At this point, Ulog pipes in real fast, "Sorry, misunderstood. She doesn't get the letter. We deliver it ourselves to the Lawmaster. I don't trust her to take it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) This is like us planning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then, we expose them both, have them dropped or arrested, leaving the vacant spot, and they're out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have one question. This Lord Sutan? What's to keep the High-Richter and the Lawmaster from just going and snatching him up and putting him in chains?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait, from who?" Dolan puts his hand up and says, "I'm sorry, reiterate that?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well, we're going to forge this letter from Lord Sutan, right? Saying that there's an assassination attempt against the Richter. We go to the Richter's place, we tossle it, then we deliver a letter from Sutan, saying there was an attempt of the Richter's life. So if I was the Richter, and I went to the Lawmaster, I'd just go disappear Lord Sutan. Your Richter will stay in his seat, and you'll be short one Lord, if I'm not mistaken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Especially considering you said the Richter was already pretty corrupted. Seems like assassination attempts in reverse wouldn't be out of her bailiwick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you suggest, then?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's my question to Dolan, why do you want-- Horris wants to be in the office?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Dolan is to be elevated. Horris is taking a back seat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Horris, if you don't mind me asking, what was your practice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was a physician."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We had a practice together. One of us had to take the fall. I accepted it myself. Dolan couldn't-- Dolan has too much at stake."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dolan, what makes you think that you can beat the system that you would then be joining?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the system's too big for us to deconstruct from the outside. At the very least, I can hope to improve it from the inside. I know the Lawmaster is a good woman. There are good people in there. But if we can root out the cancers, the tumors that threaten to make it what it is, and what it could become, that's something. We have to try."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not shy of a conscience. I'm afraid I'd need to know a little bit more about this High-Richter Prucine. Hopefully, he's a terrible individual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She. And yes. She has been responsible--" Ulog, at this point, you can see his fingers gritting into the table. "She's the one who put my wife in that blasted prison."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember you saying that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sorry about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I hate to say anything else without seeing something for ourselves. You seem to have a good plan for getting rid of Sutan, but it seems you might need some further measures to get rid of this Richter as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have been discussing that. If you have any suggestions, please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you could do a lot with a seal from a lord. A lot more than claiming an assassination attempt. Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Literally anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you feel like the Empire, or the Lawmaster, is onto your group? Your Knights of Requital? Do they know your name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you have already mentioned that some of your people were followed and eyed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They don't, to my knowledge, know of the group. Just some of the individuals."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which ones, specifically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there is Themond, but he's left, and has not gone to a meeting since he's started to be followed. He was the one who delivered the letter to the High-Richter. It was mainly-- nothing directly related to our meetings and more just the delivery of our intercepted letter."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a proposal for you. Are you one hundred percent sure that they haven't heard of your name, Knights of Requital? How attached are you to that name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not. It wasn't something we chose, it just emerged from our meetings."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you ever want someone to stop looking for something-- they'll stop as soon as they know that thing is gone, or dead. So how about we frame High-Richter Prucine as the head of this Knights of Requital and let the law handle it the way they will. And we'll take care of Lord Sutan at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little bit of a smile, curls across Horris' face. He nods, "I think this is a pretty sound step in the right direction."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate to do away with a great name, but you work with what you have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an okay name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could workshop it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could workshop it. There's always more names.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do we leave evidence of correspondence in the home of the High-Richter, then?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any secret symbols? Or stamps or seals that you use for communication that we could plant in the house, or the place of dwelling of the High-Richter? A ring, a piece of jewelry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We could fabricate some."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was also the notice on the King's Hall looking for y'all. I don't know if you knew that, by the way. I imagine a notice in one of these people's houses might mean that they have concern of being found.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we frame this the right way, it sure would do a lot for your ambitions to become that High-Richter, Dolan, if you were the ones to turn in the evidence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could win twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'd find this evidence in the home, in the right place. That could be enough."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it would be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now, the Lawmaster works under the High-Richter, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Lawmaster works above the High-Richter."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. This will work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a (thump, hiss) as Ulog has pulled the cork of a small bottle of ale that was sitting there for a while, and begins to drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is her name Kara?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kara, I think it's Kara.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kara, I like the enthusiasm you had about your plan. What sort of skills could you bring to this equation? Are you stealthy? Sneaky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Honestly, more of a thinker. Ulog, however--" She points to the dwarf again, who has finished drinking, "Yeah, I used to run with some pretty shifty lot. Done a bit of burglary in my past."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like that. Tell us about this Myriad, a little bit. What is it exactly that you guys are so nervous about with these people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're not nervous about the Myriad, other than the fact that the Myriad's a bunch of fuckheads that steal, enslave, and push all sorts of unsavory business. They're the mirror side to the bullshit the Empire does. For all that, we want to make sure that if we can connect any of them to the Myriad, and Lord Sutan is definitely connected: two birds, one stone. But then we have to plant evidence in two."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That can be done. We have other associates, upstairs. We didn't want to encroach too much on your space. We'd like time to confer with them over the night, perhaps meet again midday tomorrow. We should find a new spot, though. Repetition is a recipe for disaster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dolan sits back. "It's a good point. Any recommendations?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're actually quite new. Maybe you could provide one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He thinks for a moment. Through his paperwork.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Consult your paperwork.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Allow me to collect my additional notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Shut up."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How about The Song and Supper Inn?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Song and Supper Inn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's on the west side of the Interstead Sprawl."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The "SAS."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far from here? How much time to travel? Not far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe 40 minutes on foot."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Shall we call it just after noon tomorrow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What name should we be looking for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other. Kara leans forward, "Let's say-- The Inquiry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Inquiry. It's got a nice ring to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. I appreciate that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for trusting us. I believe we can make quite the impact with these movements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dolan nods and smiles. Looks to Horris, looks to the other two. "Thank you. We've been needing more than just angry voices of half-enthused common folk. People of action are hard to find that seem to have a trusted heart."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give you one piece of advice, Dolan, though. I would challenge you to think about this for the night, think real long and hard, if you're willing to jump into the ring. Some pretty high-ranking asshole gladiators. Should probably be willing to take a few licks. Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) "Asshole gladiators."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Taking a few licks."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was trying to go "before you jump into the ring with Muhammad Ali" type of thing, but Muhammad Ali isn't here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You gotta pull up. Pull up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, lick those gladiator assholes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dolan's stare goes a little distant as he tries to fully comprehend the gravity of your statement before slowly nodding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see Fjord shift his weight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, make sure you know what you're getting into.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awful people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will take that into consideration. Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Powerful tricks. That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that. And you, I guess as we begin to put this together, what are your specialties?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I dabble a bit in the arcane, nothing too impressive, but a little more than nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Very well then, tomorrow afternoon, The Song & Supper."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like to exit first or should we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulog leans forward a bit and goes, "After you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Much obliged. I head out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go along with Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No strange behavior, there doesn't seem to be any business or activity towards the back or the alley. Nothing that catches your eye to be suspicious or encroaching upon the meeting below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything's okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can reply to this message.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like to join us inside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't reply.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott? Would you like to-- Hello?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six seconds. Yes! You can reply to this message!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all regather in the center of The Leaky Tap tavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You come from being touched by some kind of primordial chaos magic, something powerful, strange, creative, and bizarre. You've recently had everything turned upside down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really have!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not the one you're going to find. It's true! You are walking towards some destiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just not the one you're expecting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I only did three cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are really, really, really good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good fortune.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, strangers!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a booger on the tip of your nose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just a traveling halfling!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I just told a random person they had a booger on the tip of their nose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just a random person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, you would tell a random person they have a booger on their nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a random person with a really familiar voice, though. You need to talk to Fjord, and see if you can figure out how to sound different.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks for keeping an eye out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did it go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crazy!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, impressions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were down there a really long time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the benefit for us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm also not keen on taking the word of someone else without getting some evidence of our own.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree. Who knows? We can't be replacing someone corrupt with someone even worse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should follow one of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we don't know anything about this Dolan, this Horris' motives, or their agenda.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't. While we're following them, perhaps we should try and find out what we can about this-- Lean in closer. Closer. This High-Richter Prucine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have the ones downstairs already left?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you see Ulog make his way up and take a different table at the far corner. Then slowly, over the next 15 or so minutes, the other three exit the building.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to follow them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we go now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, blessings!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I send Frumpkin after her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a dry skin. You got it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I couldn't see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth role. With advantage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth role? Okay, not good. Worse. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one are you following? There's the half elf--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know any of their names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two human men and then there is the dwarf male.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two humans.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The two humans. Are they traveling together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are. You follow them for the next 20 or so minutes before they come to a modest home. It's in a little bit of disrepair especially in the recent the recent storm; part of the roof is sinking inward a little bit. They enter, close and lock the door behind them. They glance through the window and they have a heated conversation back and forth. If you want to listen, then make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a hand on Beau's shoulder--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: EVERYONE
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a thing forever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah it should be every time. It's a rule.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: House rule.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to hear. It's muffled; the wall's thick. It's not an argument, more of a lot of passionate conversation back and forth, some aggressive counter points to some sort of conversation. Eventually they both settle down with a bottle of wine, and you glance through the window. You see the one with the blond hair is sobbing into his arms at a table, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both men. The other one has his arm around the other and consoles him. Looking inside, you see it's a lot of books across the wall, you recognize there are some alchemical vials or other things that similar-type glass containers that can be utilized for that. Some dried roots are hanging from the wall. A lot of them appear to be medicinal in nature. After about 20 minutes or so of watching this, nothing strange catches your eye. It seems like two people winding down after a stressful day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are any of those books of an arcane nature, because I'm also looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception roll for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking through Frumpkin. Very bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She basically looks like a Pennywise, like a teeny Pennywise peeking through their--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just a clown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, it does!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too hard to see from the outside. You can barely tell there are books there. The very low light there is inside, you can't make out any details.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a single level house? Nothing fancy about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not quite like impoverished, but it's not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any papers? Any weapons visible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can be used to defend oneself and also as a walking stick. A shillelagh if you will. You can see a general shortsword that is put on a belt that is hung on a wall, but nothing in there that is militarized.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll knock on the door, and then run away before they can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, that was pretty cool. You learned something!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go back and report to my friends. And that's what I saw, Caleb, and the others of you who are not my friends, I'll also tell. Just kidding guys, I love you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can drop that, uh--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is who I am now. I'm sure it's run out by now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for an hour. It's probably run out by now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what we also need? I want some eyes on this High-Richter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should find out where she lives and how she treats people, see if the stories are true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe tomorrow morning we can go spy on her house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe we can even split a team, some people go and spy on the house, some people maybe go to the stockade, talk to the people she's locked up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. We might need to find out where she lives tonight, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm down for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should have asked, but I forgot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, is Ulog still sitting at the other table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, he's probably left. It's been about an hour since you returned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hard to find that out without seeming suspicious, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the High-Richter is just an official.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But isn't it weird to go, "Where does the High-Richter live?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not if you have official business with the Richter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At this hour?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's very urgent business.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could find out how the High-Richter treats people by posing as people in need.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Exactly what I was going to suggest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's disguise ourselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we don't need to, Caleb--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As clowns?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I did not catch all of the meeting that you went to the other night. Are they paying anything? Are we doing this for altruistic reasons?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a very good question. I second that question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't do anything for altruistic reasons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never done anything for free in my entire life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So has anything been discussed in advance, is all I'm asking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if this plan gets pulled off, and we help Dolan get in that seat of the High-Richter, than we suddenly have friends in high places. And I

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To answer Caleb's question, we kind of forgot to discuss that part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right, there should be compensation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want the rest of us to go tomorrow, or do we still need to be look out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I think we should all go. They should get a look at us as a whole, see who they're dealing with, just in case there's any shady shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we look like ourselves or other people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would you like to look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't care.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's at your discretion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll decide on the day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody feel like finding out where this High-Richter lives this evening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it. How do we do that? (laughing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can ask the owner of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start there, why not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Charm him, ask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to go ask Claudia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is about 1:00, 1:30 in the morning though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's already that late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys met around midnight. So you can go try and wake up Claudia, if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Claudia's not awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about that big white dragonborn, maybe he knows?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the barkeep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wessek is there. Wessek is sitting back, it's a very slow night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Wessek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello, little blue girl, what can I do for you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's it going with you? It's really late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is very late, and I'm sort of wondering what you're bothering me with this late? I'm curious."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I just remembered that I was supposed to deliver a personal message to the High-Richter, and I can't remember where they live. Do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, I don't."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what area of town it would be in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I couldn't tell you. The High-Richter is pretty, well, pretty high up there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably like the Tri-Spires or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most likely, or at least somewhere where it's official. It's my guess."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that was a fun conversation, goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Goodbye!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is The Pillow Trove still open?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Pillow Trove is an inn, of course it's open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can try and ask there, huh?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Getting in would be a little tricky, you'd have to get by the guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 1:00 in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Perhaps we should rest tonight and plan this little needy-folk charade in the morning. We can always take the sewers into the Tri-Spires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, that's what I was thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yawning) We totally can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said we totally can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, you've mentioned you tried to get into the Tri-Spires and you had a disguise on, and it didn't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not have a--oh yeah. There is some sort of wards on the gates there. It's something I've done 100 times in small towns. I tried to disguise myself, and there was nothing there, they saw right through it, and they were dicks about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think it was just in that passage way or do you think it's the entire Tri-Spire area?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like that would be a really big enchantment to put on the the entire thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is not the entire Tri-Spire, because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The entire Tri-Spire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not. Not Nott, it is not. I cased the smut shop, I looked for arcane things there and did not, well. But I was able to use my abilities.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll be it. We use the sewers to get in, disguise ourselves, avoid detection, find out what we need to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can work with this plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we retire for the night?

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll head up to my room first and I'll pull Molly up with me, because I need to have a word with him. Molly, listen. I can't get over the fact that Nott was going through my stuff. I want to set a little bit of a trap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you want to set some sort of trap or example for her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I just want to see if she's learned her lesson or not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to put an object in the middle of the room with our door open, and we're going to hide out of sight. You game?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. I'll use Minor Illusion to put in the middle of the room a bundle of buttons with a tall, shiny flask covered in jewels, right in the middle of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to put down some ball bearings? I've got a big bag of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I guess so. Once she's in, we're going to shut the door. I want to figure out what the fuck she's sneaking around for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So both of you guys go and hide? Stealth check from both of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a passive perception of--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12 or something? Right? Where is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, passive perception I believe for you is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all go to bed, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys go to sleep--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wait, I knock on Jester and Beauregard's door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) What is it that you want, knocking on our door so late at night, Caleb?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No more Oskar for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sultrily) I brought my tusk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are turning in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, by all means, but I have changed my mind. I feel guilty for discarding the book that you purchased for me and I was wondering if I could read it tonight, but only if you are going to bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, see what you can find. Have I finished it? I haven't finished it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't finished it yet, but a little over halfway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to read it before bed. It will take me about an hour. Good night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night, Caleb!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give it to him, it's fine. He needs a little self confidence, a little encouragement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you go read it. Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel the urge to go sneak into a room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just an open door with a bunch of buttons and a flask in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not even locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's empty, it's dark, except for you see this-- Actually, make a-- Let me check one thing on this. Just to see how this works in this circumstance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lot of great shirts in the store. Great shirts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, what is this? What is this roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is majorly cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (groan)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have taken the cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you see a shining bag of glittering coin and buttons spilling out of the top of this small satchel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would this even be here? And a flask on top? Wow! Do I see Fjord's belongings over near his bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As soon as she comes in the door, the door slams shut. Molly, get the window!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I draw my hand crossbow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you an imposter?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. We are going to have a talk. Don't try any funny business. Why are you trying to sneak through our stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would never do that to a friend!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly told me! Molly told me you were in here rifling through my stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was hungry. There's a definite explanation for this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What were you looking for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seafood. You must have some on you; you're of the sea. I love shrimp, and I never get a chance to get any, we're so landlocked in here. I love the taste of the sea!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I believe her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nott, dear? Why don't you tell the nice man the truth? Devil's Tongue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! What is that? What does that do? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why I brought you in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom? Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are charmed by Mollymauk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning, you're very friendly and amiable, and take his advice and suggestions like a very dear friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably should just tell him what you were really looking for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was looking for your letter to the Soltryce Academy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My letter? But, Nott, why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) I want it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What for? It's fine, no one's in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to give it to Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, why? What would Caleb do with it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What you would do with it. Study, learn magic, become more powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You wouldn't want me to have that sort of ability, you'd rather Caleb have it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know a lot about magic, but I know he has the potential to be very powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I need him to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, Nott? Why do you need him to be powerful?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he can save me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we can help save you, that's what friends do. Any of us who get more powerful can help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, what do you need to be saved from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) So much. So much. But mainly, there's a lot of dangers in the world, and a lot of dangers for me, and especially the closer we get to the north? I think? They don't like me up there. He can protect me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we can all do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. No, you can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) Nott, I hope you will learn to trust us and rely on us like you do Caleb. We may not be as powerful as he is, or has the ability to become, but certainly we can help you. Are you worried about something or someone in particular finding you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Yes, there's a few people that I'm worried about, but no one specific where we're going. I know that people are always trying to get me, and (stammering) I wish-- I need his magic to be there for me when I need safety. I need him. I need him to live.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. I'm sorry if we've upset you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you're cool for some reason right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not for some reason, I'm just cool in general, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This shit is amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to last, you do know that. It's not going to last.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just for now, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, enjoy it while you have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Promise me that you will not go through my things anymore when I'm not around, and that the items that I have belong to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you give me the letter? I could change your name on it to his name, and then he could use it to get into the school, and he could learn more powerful magic and then he could change me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Change you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could change this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) I understand. I know what it feels like to be ashamed or worried about what you look like. I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're pretty handsome for a half-monster thing. (whispering) I think Jester likes you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You think so?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I didn't always look like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wasn't always a handsome half-monster thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you use to be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A kid, just like anyone else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still a monster thing, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Just a less handsome one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Stumpy, short. Big teeth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you a fat kid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, if we get to the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any pictures or--? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If my MySpace is still up, you could see them. Goes back a tick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you ever have braces or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, if we get to the Soltryce Academy and that letter doesn't do me any good, I promise, you could have it and we'll make sure Caleb has a shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you promise to keep Caleb alive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most definitely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to try and keep both of you alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look out for us, we'll look out for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I ask you one favor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You cannot have my stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember, Nott, that next time you try and do this and if that letter goes missing again, I can do this to you again. I give her just enough of a knock on the head to break the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember what we talked about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stick my foot out right when she runs by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man. Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acrobatics check? 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? That's enough. As you're darting through, you see the foot go out, and you leap, tumble, roll and make your way into the hallway and escape back to your chambers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, that was more than I thought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was very interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you make of all that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyone who looks like us, you collect a few interesting enemies on the way, even at her age.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you praying over your swords tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course. Every night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Can I join you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, I'm just putting up the thread, come to bed. Come to bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you trust Fjord and Molly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. No, I don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me neither.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (poof) Alarm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Oskar falls in love with her! And he carries her across a field, and they love each other so much!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the most beautiful story, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we go to sleep, now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the hard turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The morning is yours, what do you wish to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go to Jester and Beauregard's room and say--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sultrily) Oh, you're back again already, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good morning, sleepy heads! I leave the book leaning against the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Killed it in one night. Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. The rest of you gather--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your morning breakfast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you find anything good in this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I find anything good in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because a lot of the information about Xhorhasian society is still largely unknown or uncatalogued, you get the sense the more you read, and the more the perspectives of this assassin's left across the way, you're uncertain as to how accurate any of it is-- but it talks of a torturous society of bloodshed and beasts, a-- I got an eyelash in my eye, that's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Okay, we're good. Talking of this terrible life of endless wastes of carnivorous and cannibalistic creatures and that the Crick nation being this terrible place of perpetual inner turmoil, and vying for the next position of power. The assassin that falls into this relationship falls into it as perspective of being saved, of being taken from this terrible place and brought into the good graces of this General, and brought into the comforting realm of the Empire. However, upon being discovered, ends up being captured, tried, and killed. The last part of the book deals with the General going through his own grief and the process, but also understanding it never could be, and was probably for the best. You're left with a unsatisfied meh feeling at the end of it all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you call it a blue balls feeling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a lot more historical fiction in it than actual pornographic content, I was surprised.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't really ultimately matter, but I feel like that was like a toxic relationship. I didn't really feel like the assassin and Theo should have-- I mean, he led to her death. That kind of sucks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feels like it's weighing on you. It's amazing what a good book can do, it gets its grips into you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we a book club now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Morning, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's wrong? Did you guys get into a fight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nott is just upset because she was trying to do a little reading last night as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you get a book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, Nott. You can read this now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is this one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the Tusk Love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we set out our plan. Sewers. Make ourselves look like poor folk. Make our way into the Tri-Spire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not poor folk, rich folk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, no, but we're seeking help of the Richter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't matter, we can't be poor folk in the Tri-Spire. We need to be rich folk that need help from the Richter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, because if we come out looking like rats, then out we will go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Upper middle class? Lower middle class?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Upper middle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very high middle if not low upper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Medium well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're a family that is down on our luck, because--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a warm, pink center.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's our cover story? What's the ruse here? We need help from the government because bandits have taken over our house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Oh! Yes, how about we have a trading company! How about some of our wares got stolen on the road on the way to Zadash by a group of bandits?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! We know things, why don't we pose as like Trostenwald brewers or something and our brew shipment-- I'm spitballing-- got stolen by someone and we need help to get it back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know if the High-Richters normally rule on or govern over?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to ask if the two empire kids know about that position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know that the High-Richter is the associate judge to the Lawmaster. The Lawmaster oversees very high profile judgments, and then anything that falls below anything high-profile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Circuit judge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Things go through the High-Richter first before they go to the Lawmaster. They gauge what is important enough for the Lawmaster and what remains in their circle, which is why you can see the frustration with anything that they try to bring forth that may have been incriminating to an ally of the High-Richter could be easily caught in that net and not brought upward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have this inventory sheet that I got from the Baumbauchs, we could use this as claims that it got stolen. And hope for reimbursement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stolen by someone in the government?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or stolen by the Baumbauchs? I mean, if we do something that a family within the Tri-Spire needed representation, the law upheld, but the Richter turned an eye because a more powerful family was winning out, then that person is shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is like an order invoice that I have, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The order ledger or you mean the letter?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, the order ledger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From the brewery, that we took in session zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you're not talking about the letter from Baumbauch from the Gentleman, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but in that I have an order ledger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we could claim that he never paid due and we are looking for some sort of representation to try and get our money from the Baumbauchs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
