lines.text: I didn't understand any of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a forgery kit, you guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we forging?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if he would hold sway, but if he doesn't pursue justice, for someone of the Tri-Spire, that should tell us enough. The Baumbauchs are very influential and powerful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, that's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could change the name of the Baumbauchs to something else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could be the Baumbauchs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you think, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I honestly don't understand any of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it say on the ledger the company that it came from? Does it say like from Dryer Supply and Co.?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What accent was that?

lines.name: LAUREN
lines.text: Dwarven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me! Me being an asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Timalt Store House.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Timalt Store House.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't Timalt make hardware?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it can be from the Timalts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Baumbauchs stole our stuff?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They never paid due on the order that we sent them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we even know the Baumbauchs are here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, they're in Trostenwald.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would we be claiming something here? We need to be claiming from a family that's here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Timalt is from here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Timalts are in Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are in Zadash. They made a shipment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If the High-Richter doesn't say, "You're right, this is injustice, let's take it to the Lawmaster," then that Richter sucks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She could be a lazy ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Regardless, it's just a story so we can get a bead on her, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we say, "We're from the Timalt Company, they never paid our invoice, and they stole our puppies!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Puppy crime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how we would know that it was a bad guy. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So they stole from our invoice and they took all our Saint Bernard puppies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and it is very sad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mid-morning. 10:00.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time, exactly, of the day?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it early enough to where, on my way there, I can pick up my custom coat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Especially since it just rained, so the sewer will be really damp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we trying to go through the sewer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To get all of us through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's pick up your cloak and make our way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we still have the writ, or is the writ gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The writ was retrieved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind, that's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can still find the back sewer entrance, have Nott pop the lock, and we know how to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why didn't we try to forge a writ, damn it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who all can make disguises for themselves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! I can figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my coat, kind of-ish?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can cover up your face, at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mmkay, so you guys make your way back to the same sewer entrance where you originally embarked below. There are two crownsguard in the vicinity, they're keeping watch of that intersection, just like they were last time. They haven't noticed your approach yet, but they are keeping an eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to have to distract them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could have one of them beat the shit out of the other one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do that. I cast Crown of Madness on one of the guards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not going to go poorly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! So into this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully from an area where they don't see me casting it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blessing of the Trickster! Advantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I have advantage? Nah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's higher than ten, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it is! 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of a sudden, the guard (grunts) and you watch as these motes fit faintly around the outside, like this floating crown on the top of the head. You force him to attack the other?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kick his ass, sea bass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard (grunts) grabs his blade, runs forward. The other guard is like, "Hey, what-- oh!" (screams) Pulls his shield up. "What's going on?! David, what the fuck are you doing?!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott! Quick, let the lock on the sewer thing, let's go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm doing something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't have to, it's not locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was locked!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's find out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to make another save. It's a two, it's still holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the sewer locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gate? It is locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I'll pick it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's attention right now is directly on this as one crownsguard is attacking the other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's plus six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven. No, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. It's not coming off, it's not opening!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Break it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He attacks the other guard, he's screaming, "Get help!" No, it's an 11. What's your spell DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to break the gate, I try to pull the gate! I'm trying to pull it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check. Roll a d20, add your strength modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (ping) You actually break it with your bare hands, leaving an opening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, go, go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a scream starting to happen, you guys start running in, one after another. Guard gets one more saving throw. 13, what's your--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14?! Shit! The other guard is now wrestling him to the ground, and he's trying to hold him to the ground. "What the fuck?!" You hear screams going off around now this ruckus is gathering in the center as people are starting to yell. You can hear in the distance other crownsguard yelling and starting to gather in the middle of this chaos as you all get down in the sewer, and pull it shut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I might've fucked that thing up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep going!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to be quiet in the sewers because there's things down here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, avoid all the rat balloons!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were everywhere the last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear all the ruckus up there, echoing down inside and other footsteps coming through and you hear this guy going, "I am so sorry, I don't know what was happening! Ow, that hurts! I don't know what's--" and you hear he's being held to the ground now, and people are shouting and, oh man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that guy is definitely arrested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy's going to have a bad day!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He might get demoted, a couple day's pay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is going to be about 12 inches shorter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You still have the blessing. Does anybody else need a blessing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all rolling stealth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At a mass majority, you do slip around the same area where you had the original confrontation, you do see some more of those rats scattered about, but you manage to quickly dart by. In a few moments, you hear a (hiss) turn as they notice something, but they go in the direction, as you go in to move past. Some of them shift in where you were but no longer where you are. The blind rats are going by the sound and being misled a bit, so you manage to maneuver around without any immediate conflict. Eventually, you make your way back to where those webs were situated before the phase spider's little domain there at the edge. Still in tatters, untouched from where you left it. You head back to the rung and you can see the entranceway into the Tri-Spire District.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did not think about what to do once we got into this part of the plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to disguise ourselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we go up there and then find out where the Richter lives and then pitch our really ill-thought out plan to them. This is going to be great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I cast Disguise Self. Very long black cloak with gold trim, like a nice trim goatee and slicked back jet black hair. Piercing blue eyes, nice looking human.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take the brown side of my newly purchased reversible coat, take out my Brewer's Kit that I have, and take a few of the bottles and fashion them to my waist a little bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disguise Self. Same exact thing as Fjord, except longer hair, shorter mustache.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cloak, gold trim?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, everything. Shorter, but female, just a little outline for the mustache.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like the pallbearer to the undertaker of Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great analogy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you! Anybody else making any effort or are you just doing your thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Disguise Self and I'm going to be tan, short, elven woman in a royal blue lace dress, very similar to the one the lady was wearing, with the cut out. And soft medium hair, pulled back in waves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put the hood up and stay in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I make myself look like the male version of the elven woman that Jester did in a similar high collared clothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. This is great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fated to do well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're a normal family!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment you climb up the top-- did you leave it locked? Did you lock it behind you as you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, you tell me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we didn't. I don't think we did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head back, push the two pipes, and you all climb back into the alleyway. You are now in the Tri-Spire district.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome. Okay, let's ask around and find where this Richter lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walking around the city, you see a few crownsguard wandering the streets, they occasionally put a glance to not recognize you wandering, but don't pay immediate attention. You do see one gentleman, early 60s or so, who's wearing this nice frilled shirt with heavy brass buttons down the front with this potbelly that's tucked in with a belt, breeches that go past the knee before his boots hit, and he's walking in the street, strutting a bit, looking up. He's the first person you see that crosses your path that looks like they probably know the vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to go talk to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello sir, excuse me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry to bother you, we have business with the High-Richter. Is there a chance that you could point us in his direction-- her direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that is the High-Richter's estate. I do not know if she is home. She may be at the King's Hall."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really don't care, we're just delivering a parcel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Let's see. Dayana's estate is right around that way." He points. You see that he has this thin, white John Waters mustache across the top that turns into this light goatee right at the tip of the chin. As he points over, you can see, "Right on the outskirts of the Gilded Willows-- that one." He points again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wonderful, thank you for your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was my pleasure." He continues walking on his way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk like him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, your mustache is much nicer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, honey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know what a mime is? You just mime this mission.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. There's a fierce wind, I've got to--! Oh no! I'm in a box! Oh no! The box is getting smaller! Don't worry, I'll climb out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, what Fjord is implying is-- you know how I can make myself look like anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not an idiot! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beyond that, there is the front door to the estate where there is a stationed crownsguard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This looks really well fortified.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to walk up and ask for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask for an audience, yeah. Maybe if we say that we were sent by the Lawmaster, for the High-Richter to make a ruling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we leave anyone out to be ready to help if anything goes wrong?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good instinct, what do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Caleb, what do you think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you're always good to have hidden away in case something goes squirrely. So definitely you. Maybe me as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I'd like you to come.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to come. (with an accent) I want to come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Molly, what do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I am a very reasonable personal assistant to anyone who is trying to make a deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. What would your name be in this situation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have to have names?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just trying to think ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, fine. Erikson.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lawrence is great. Worked for me before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lawrence?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, no. Let's do something else, considering I already used Lawrence once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you need a drink?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I do. I had a terrible night last night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about Marge?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Francis. Francis Titmalt-- Timalt, not Titmalt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you staying out here with Nott, Caleb, or are you going to come in? If we make it in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you make it in? No, I'm going to stay with Nott. I will be back-up. You're a good talker. We don't need two good talkers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, cat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How will we know what's going on inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't like cats here in the Tri-Spire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that we're hidden away in case things go bad with the crownsguard. After that then they're on their own, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. Wish us luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up to one of the two crownsguard outside the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow behind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Super official.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be careful, twinnie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is actually only one crownsguard at the front door, behind the gate. As you approach, arms crossed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Yes, please, look lively, unfortunately we've been sent here from the Lawmaster, we have some very urgent business with High-Richter Prucine. Please, if you wouldn't mind, would you fetch her?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glad you fixed that. The guard goes, "Oh, I-- Just a second," goes and opens the door, leaning inside. "High-Richter, you have guests out front." A voice goes, "Tell them to wait a moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like her already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes. The crownsguard steps out of the way and you see emerge from the doorway an older female half-elf with dark red-purple hair that is short on the sides and brushed to one side, almost to a point. She has a gaunt, angular appearance, and is in the process of putting on ceremonial gold and white armor, similar to what you had seen on the Herald of the Hall, but a more elaborate design, and taken from the process of buckling together a brace. She walks up and goes, "All right, now who's here for their time with me?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, High-Richter, it's so lovely to see you again. I know it's been quite a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea who you are."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brantley. We met-- must have been years ago now. You remember the Gala.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it was a fundraiser, last time you were up for election?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! 14 plus four, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, of course, I recall. It's been some time. What brings you to the front of my homestead in the middle of the day? I'm on my way to the Hall."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. A bit of terrible business, actually. Our family has been unfortunately at the poor end of some corporate espionage, and I'm afraid the Baumbauchs, isn't that who they are in Trostenwald?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible evil, the Baumbauchs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Especially that Demedan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a wretched fellow. They've made off with quite a bit of our product, and we have some evidence against them. We tried to take it to the Lawmaster, of course, we didn't want to trouble you, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She directed us here, we thought, well, Dayana is just so sweet, she would of course help us out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here is the invoice from the amount due that they have not paid from the Timalt Store House.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure justice will be swift, but unfortunately, much of our family's finances are wrapped up in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they took our puppies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like both of you to make deception checks, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is turning the diamond over and over in his hand like a fidget spinner, watching all of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least you have the diamond, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, what should I roll? Give me something good. That's not too bad. 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is Trostenwald territory. I'm afraid that is not something I would nor could handle if I wanted to. If you wish to bring them to justice either present your evidence to the lawmaster of Trostenwald, or bring Baumbauch to me. Otherwise, I have no interest."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have already done that exact thing! We wouldn't waste your time with such rudimentary worries, but–

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then why are you wasting my time right now?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, frankly, the Lawmaster in Trostenwald seemed to show you very little respect when we mentioned your name, and being that our family is so influential around here, we're going to be tossed to the wayside if justice isn't found. Surely you understand that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And, of course, we would happily pay you for any type of additional services you might be able to help us out with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Am I– step inside." The crownsguard step inside and close the door behind. "Am I to understand that you've come out here in broad daylight to my estate in an attempt to bribe the High-Richter of Zadash?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that what you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I don't think those were my words at all. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was merely a few pennies for your time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A favor for a favor!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I mean certainly if you feel like doing justice on its own– I would like to see people taken care of that take care of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So long as it's not a bribe. Favors we can do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, of course!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll take these documents, if you don't mind, to see what can be mustered."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And, of course, we are always willing to repay in favors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. There are all sides and types of favors that can be helpful to the Crown and those below."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, what do you think of puppies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think they're droll and must be fed to their larger kin. So are we done here?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I believe we are. Thank you for your time. We're most gracious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm certain it has been."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he wraps it up, can I do a quick glance over her table or over her desk to see if I see any type of papers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is on the front doorstep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I thought she pulled us inside. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she pulled the crownsguard inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But since we're inside of that seven-foot wall: windows, doors, security measures, how many floors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the immediate front position, there is the door itself beyond the archway, two small windows to each side of it, though it appears that they're closed, and they're bisected with wooden beams between.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shuttered? Wooden shuttered closed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd open them from the inside to bring in the light, but they're currently closed. The second floor above you do see one balcony. It's a bit receded and there's a balcony that looks out over it all with a second set of doors, but that is currently closed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we're bowing on our way out, I'm going to drop my waterskin and spill it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Erikson!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! I'm so sorry, my lord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every time! Every time!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I got you. I follow you now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an immediate bit of a scowl and, "I would also ask nicely if you'll stop bringing these demon bloods onto my estate to be ruining--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what we were looking for this whole time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the puppy thing wasn't enough? Come on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, they're kicking cats in this bitch, so it's not that far off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A thousand apologies, my lord, I'll take your sister and make sure she gets her medicine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You embarrass me!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How dare you, Erickson!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please make sure she's beaten as you lead her away. I apologize for his fuddy-duddyness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hard to find good help these days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for your time. Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns around wordlessly and goes inside and slams the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, guys. Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's easy ways to find out if people are terrible or not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that was good. Well, we walk a fair distance away from the crownsguard and we see Caleb and little pallbearer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did, they-- oh. Hi, honey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a small Morticia Addams.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a mustache.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we've got it buttoned down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she offer to kill a bunch of innocents or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean she said that dogs should be fed to the larger ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she said that tieflings were terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, devil's advocate, here: I really don't like dogs either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but puppies, Nott, puppies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, they make great food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you're out in the woods and that's all that you have to eat, they have very tender meat! And, to be fair, (whispering) Mollymauk is a little bit of, I mean, I wouldn't trust him either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, but imagine if she had gotten her eyes on you. I mean, don't know what she would have done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that would make her the same as 95 percent of people in this city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that means she's got to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are not going bring this woman's life down in a shambles because she is an asshole, I mean, we are assholes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we're assholes without power, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, it's less dangerous? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, you notice that the streets themselves have long silken streamers that are affixed from light pole to light pole as part of the decoration along the streets, but you see additional decorations being put up. You see bunches of flowers being affixed to the top of these poles, you can see more streamers of multiple colors being placed around a center courtyard, in one of the mid-areas of the Silken Terrace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Must be some sort of harvest theme that everything is going up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's that harvest fest. Remember, there's another tournament and stuff that we can enter into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just the Tri-Spire, or is it everywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's just being put around the Gilded Willows, which is a little ways further away from the estate as you're heading back. You can see decorations going up, tables being set, it looks to be a small platform being risen. There's some sort of event coming up fairly soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm perfectly content making snap judgements of people, I've been doing it all my life and it's very rarely steered me wrong, and in another time and another place, I'd be more than happy to run something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know if this woman has done anything besides being a snide puppy-hater.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She takes bribes. She's a corrupt politician.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have personally bribed people, I don't know that I would-- listen, I do not like the government--I say this quietly--I do not like the empire, but we're really sticking our neck out with very dangerous people. I don't think we have much to go on, I don't think we know how we're going to be receiving recompense for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is going to have to be some coin, of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Certainly, your fears are founded. If there's not enough pay, then obviously it's not worth the risk. But I have to say, that even after meeting them for the second time, I feel like these people, they're good folks. I think they just want to see their city bettered. Honestly, that Dolan fellow I think would do better in a seat of power than this current wench.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I am willing to discuss our continued involvement, once the payment is figured out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, look. People in power tend to get corrupt, they don't start corrupt. In my opinion, it doesn't matter who's sitting there, as long as we get paid from it, who cares?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And there's still many things to figure out. We have to look after this Lord Sutan. But first, we should see to that afternoon meeting, about the coin. We should address that straight out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we have to leave the Tri-Spire then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I guess we do. We're meeting them at the Song & Supper Inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just after noon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just after noon? You didn't get an hour?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was not specific.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have watches.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12:01. It's just after noon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Don't make me say it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's on all our minds. Unspoken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying not to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This place is giving me a rash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess let's head there, meet up with these guys. It's probably about that time, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you guys make your way, reversing your steps, outside of the Tri-Spire, making your way towards the western side of the Interstead Sprawl, to the Song & Supper Inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we leave, are there any benches around, just sitting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to leave one of the pamphlets for the Traveler sitting on a bench.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Minus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The interior looks like a lot of the paint is chipped and run or crinkled, the smell inside is not the best, but it serves basic food, basic drinks, and at least an atmosphere of music and fun. Some folks sing along, and jump into a shanty or two. As you come in, you can see both Ulog and Dolan are currently sitting at a table across from each other. As they notice you guys approach, they raise a drink, and you can see the rest of the table they have ready for you guys to come and sit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have already dropped our disguises if they recognized us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It took us 45 minutes to walk here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your spells would have run out by now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we walk into the place, I turn my coat inside out, back to the blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any guards in the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in the tavern, no. There was one outside, but patrolling the streets. Not everything is super heavily guarded in smaller areas like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like anybody is looking at us, anybody else in the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, no more than anyone looks at you when you enter a room, being a blue-skinned tiefling. You don't get the sense that anyone is casing you the entire time that you've been there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't look like anyone followed us in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't notice anybody following you in, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Dolan and Ulog are there waiting at the table, as you come and join with them. Does everybody sit with them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit at another table and listen in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord and I will go over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The rest of you are welcome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've met with them before, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you could go over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go join them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, oh fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it has to happen eventually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, keep an eye on the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go with them to the table? Dolan gives you a look. "And this is one of your associates?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'd just like to ask your name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tonya Fancybottom. Nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tonya? Pleasure. I'm Dolan, Dolan Thrym, this is Ulog." He sits there, he's like, "Hey." They both take a very long minute and look over you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I'm just being careful."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're pretty ragtag, but they're both very good at what they do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm blue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can see that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: People like her make you uncomfortable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sure? What about people like him? People like him make you uncomfortable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean only in the sense that they're fresh faces."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, just checking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm giving a clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulog leans in, he's like, "I've watched them a bit, they're all friends, it's fine." Dolan goes, "All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) We've got to look for that motherfucker more often.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's fucking everywhere. He's been following us a lot. You said he was shifty, a little criminal--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dolan goes, "All right, so, we've been looking for an opening, we've been trying to find out. We thought it was tonight, but they've pushed it back a day. There is a pre-harvest gala happening in the Tri-Spire tomorrow night. We figure this distraction would be enough to do any of the quiet infiltrations that we're attempting to accomplish, should you still be interested in coming with us. I know there was hesitation, and I don't want anyone to be coming into this that doesn't feel comfortable. To be honest, I want to be comfortable as well, and to know that we're going to bed with the right people. Are there any concerns? Any questions, worries?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. We did some casing of the High-Richter ourselves. She's not the most savory type. I believe some of my associates have a question of, well, the unsavory topic of payment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's my life savings. I want to see these fuckers burn."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. 500 from his personal stash?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check on that statement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Balls. Total balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total balls? Hard to read.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Just under 700.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's about the same as the King's Hall, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Literally, no. Figuratively? Yes. The biggest and the baddest, potentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would we be all going to this gala together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We wouldn't be going to the gala. We would be--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Breaking in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: During the gala.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so no party.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Party after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Party after."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would anyone of your group like to be joining us? Kara or Ulog, yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've got skills I think will synergize well with the ones you bring to the table. I'll be coming with you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I tend to believe him just because we haven't seen him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's pretty stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'm just me, so I don't think I'd be of much help."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have healing potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Actually, yes. Not many. We have a few left over. Horris should have a few more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in case we get hurt or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope that isn't the case. Just in case, all right. I'll have those sent. I'll send them along with Ulog for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you happen to draft up any of those Knights of Requital documents I asked for? Symbols?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes." He pulls out a small piece of parchment and discretely hands it to you under the table. You feel it tap your knee. As you look inside, it's a symbol that looks like an R, but part of the R extends beyond to produce a K, almost. It looks like a sigil or seal that utilizes the title in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's actually nice work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is really nice. That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate to burn it, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could do this, some graphic design.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you procure this for us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He created them for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't used my art degree." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got Dolan drawing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no shame in that, but we're not going to go in this without your help as well. That would be foolish."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A moment for us to confer, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would like to discuss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up for a second and says, "Ulog, drink?" "Sure." They both get up from the table and walk over to the bar to get another round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I watch Ulog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can probably get one of them the way I did with Nott last night, if you like. Make sure we're not walking into anything we don't want to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't get that impression, do you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I do not, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe not just yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the offer, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If anything, I feel bad. Feels like they're investing a lot of money on this play.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'll get their return back if he's High-Richter afterwards, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if he's not, then they don't have to pay, because we obviously failed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just being paid to empty the seat, not to put him in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But like you said, not our problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, Caleb? I know you had reservations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a good pay day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If Caleb's in, I'm in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see what kind of plan we can come up with. We have a day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear thunder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I respect this squarely, but if you really feel like this is turning, then we'll turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there's money involved, so there's incentive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a little bit of time. We can still do a little bit of casing, maybe go talk to the Gentleman and see what he has to offer in between.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a day, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? A day and a night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You have the rest of the day, the evening, and tomorrow night is apparently the Pre-Harvest Gala in the Tri-Spire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When we will strike! Jester, how do you feel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it sounds fun! Sure, why not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we order up some puppies to celebrate? Just kidding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never eaten a dog. I feel like I would feel really weird about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me neither.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can call them back over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Dolan and Ulog are having their drink at the bar. They walk up and sit down. "So can we count on you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One hundred percent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Fancybottom name is one you can trust!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A smile comes across Dolan's face. "Thank you. You won't regret it! I suppose, prepare whatever you'll need. We'll meet back in the cellar of The Leaky Tap tomorrow at sundown, and we'll take it from there." You can sense this excited nervousness to his voice that wasn't there before as he smiles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a good way to get into the Tri-Spire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have a few ideas."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Til tomorrow, then!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Til tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets up and finishes his drink and buttons the top button of his shirt, and then makes his way out. Ulog sits up, goes and takes what swills at the bottom of Dolan's drink and finishes it, then finishes his drink, pops it down. "Til tomorrow." He gets up and leaves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has anyone been watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is hard to read.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Level three, motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't notice anybody paying attention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I would've been looking, too, because I was watching for people at the beginning of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only thing you notice is that on the way out, Dolan -- As he heads to the door, you see Kara, the half-elf, was waiting at the door. As soon as he heads over, she goes, "So?" They both exit into the main thoroughfare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I actually like what Molly said. I feel like tomorrow night, before we go, you should do your thing on Ulog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also have a spell that can make people tell the truth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would work great. I think they'd understand, too. If we did it too early, I think they-- cause you to cause suspicion. After all, we're only trying to make sure that this isn't a trap set for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is possible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make you feel better, if we had the answer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Most likely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we do this evening to prepare?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get drunk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I was thinking more along the lines of checking out Lord Sutan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got to go back to the Tri-Spire? Which we can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meanwhile, at the Soltryce Academy.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: The King's Hall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that where Lord Sutan is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know much about Lord Sutan. You haven't heard his name referenced at all with any of the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They just left and we forgot to ask where the

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait wait wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. Oh! 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? You glance through the crowd, and you can just make out, it the distance, the back of Ulog as he's walking down the street, about to turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One sec. (panting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you catch up, he glances over his shoulder at the sound of the running, and he goes, "What?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You dropped this money. (whispering) Where do we find Lord Sutan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't fucking know. His estate? He's not that far from where the gala's happening."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (panting) They don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But the Tri-Spire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He knows where he lives, that's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They know where he lives.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the Tri-Spire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the Tri-Spire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's another dance through the sewer if we want to do that tonight, which we could do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe that guard got his job back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He respawned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think that ship has sailed, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure he's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well at dawn, we plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we got to figure out where the Lord Sutan's estate is, get a wax seal, a writing, forge his hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to do all that during the gala?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all, supposedly, in one night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, at dawn, we plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At dawn, we plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At dawn, we plan. And that's where we'll pick up next week. Building up to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's so much build up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. D&D, motherfucker. So we'll see where this takes you guys next week, during the Pre-Harvest Gala.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're going to have to reignite our planning thread.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come up with one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Dust the cobwebs off of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Actually come up with one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's good. We're going to go full Ocean's Nein, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got Pumat Sol back, man! We need Pumat every once and awhile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You brought back Pumat, you bought D&D smut.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And bear claws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go! Bought some bear claws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a nifty necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does cool things on D&D-- when I put it on my character, it did really cool things. It got a little picture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's cool!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On D&D Beyond. That's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
